2-3 Artist Nested Loops 5.2-3_Artist_Nested_Loops_5_a:
Bir kvadrat tepasidan keyingisini boshlaydigan joyga yetib borish uchun "oldinga sakrash" blokidan foydalanib ko'ring. 

 Agar sizning kvadratchalaringiz balandligi 20 piksel bo'lsa va ular bir-biridan 20 piksel bo'lsa, sizga qancha sakrash kerak?

2-3 Bee Functions 9.2-3_Bee_Functions_8_a: Agar boshqotirma qiyin bo‘lib tuyulsa, funksiyangizni birma-bir tuzishga harakat qiling. Bir nechta bo‘laklarni qo‘shing, so‘ngra sinab ko‘ring. Yana qo‘shib, keyin qaytadan urining. Yaqinda siz u erga etib borasiz!
2-3 Bee Functions 9.2-3_Bee_Functions_8_b:
Kodinigizni yashil funksiya bloki ichida yaratishni unutmang. 

![](https://images.code.org/8fe1fae5caf4ede3a9c9bd9f26940cde-image-1467996837459.gif)

2-3 Maze 6.2-3_Maze_6_a: Bu jumboqni yechishning ikki xil usuli bor!

4-5 Bee Conditionals 4.remember_quantum: \*\* Esingizda bo‘lsin: \*\* Ushbu boshqotirma har safar ishlatilganda o‘zgarib turadi. Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli bo‘lakdan foydalanishingiz kerak (`if` yoki `if/else`).

4-5 Bee Conditionals 5.remember_quantum: \*\* Esingizda bo‘lsin: \*\* Ushbu boshqotirma har safar ishlatilganda o‘zgarib turadi. Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli bo‘lakdan foydalanishingiz kerak (`if` yoki `if/else`).

course2_artist_nestedLoops_challenge2.courseD_artist_nestedLoops_challenge2_a: Muntazam sakkizburchakni chizish uchun rassom 8 marta 45 daraja burish kerak.
course2_artist_nestedLoops_challenge2.courseD_artist_nestedLoops_challenge2_b: Kvadrat chizish uchun rassom 4 marta 90 daraja burish kerak.

course2_bee_conditionals_challenge1.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_b: Ushbu jumboqda har bir bo'shliqda gul, asalari ini yoki hech narsa bo'lishi mumkin. Demak, har bir kvadrat bo'yicha siz "if / else" shartini takrorlashingiz mumkin.

course2_harvester_loops_challenge2.courseC_harvester_loops_challenge2_a: Ushbu muammoni hal qilishning bir usuli zig-zagga o‘xshaydi. Boshqa yo‘l spiralga o‘xshaydi! Ushbu jumboq turli xil yechimlarga ega. Qat’iyroq bo‘ling!
course2_harvester_loops_challenge2.courseC_harvester_loops_challenge2_b: Siz `oldinga yurish` va `karam maxsulotlarini yig’ish`ni xohlagancha takrorlashingiz va keyin har bir burchakka burilishingiz mumkin.
course2_harvester_loops_challenge2.courseC_harvester_loops_challenge2_c:
Jumboqni atigi 20 ta blok bilan yakunlash uchun ushbu zig-zag usulini ikki marta takrorlash mumkin!

![](<https://images.code.org/26cfaf6fe4a275e266b51e9ef3711171-image-1493502306380.18.52 PM copy.png>)
course2_harvester_loops_challenge2.courseC_harvester_loops_challenge2_d:
Ushbu spiral namunani faqat 18 ta blok bilan kodlash mumkin!

![](<https://images.code.org/0bfc0a0ed6783fae908368a6e6d12c02-image-1493501358990.18.52 PM.png>)

course3_bee_debugging_challenge1.courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1_a: Dasturning birinchi yarmi nimaga ishlamoqda? Asalari nima sababdan orgaqag harakat qilishi kerakligi haqida o‘ylab ko‘ring. U har safar gul ustidan yurganda qancha nektar asal yig‘adi?
course3_bee_debugging_challenge1.courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1_b: Orqaga qaytayotganda, asalari nektar yig‘ish jarayonidagi o‘xshashlikga rioya qilishiga amin bo‘ling. Asalari uyasi ustidan har safar yurganda, asalari qancha miqdorda asal berishi kerak?
course3_bee_debugging_challenge1.courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1_c:
Ari pastki qatorga yetib bo‘rganda, uni ushbu buyruqlarni takrorlashini ta‘minlang:

-   2 marta takrorlanadi:
    -   Oldinga harakatlanish
    -   3 ta asal olish
-   Orqaga harakatlanish

course3_bee_functions_challenge2.courseE_bee_functions_challenge1_a: Agar boshqotirma qiyin bo‘lib tuyulsa, funksiyangizni birma-bir tuzishga harakat qiling. Bir nechta bo‘laklarni qo‘shing, so‘ngra sinab ko‘ring. Yana qo‘shib, keyin qaytadan urining. Yaqinda siz u erga etib borasiz!

course3_bee_functions_challenge3.courseF_bee_functions_challenge1_a: Sizga yordam berish uchun asboblar qutisidagi funksiyalardan foydalanishingiz mumkin. Siz boshqa funksiya ta‘rifi ichidagi funksiyani chaqirishingiz mumkin!

course3_bee_functions_challenge4.courseF_bee_functions_challenge2_a: Agar o‘ng tomonga yo‘l bo‘lsa, siz quyidagilarni bajarishingiz kerak: - Har qanday nektar oling yoki asal tayyorlang. - yon tomonga qarab o‘ngga buriling. - Yon yo‘lning oxiriga o‘ting. - O‘ngga buriling. Agar yuqoridagi amallarni ikki marta takrorlasangiz, siz asosiy yo‘ldan orqaga qaytishga tayyor bo‘lasiz. \*\* To‘liq echimni ko‘rishni istasangiz, yana bir maslahat uchun bosing! \*\*
course3_bee_functions_challenge4.courseF_bee_functions_challenge2_b:
**Yechim:**

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="controls_repeat_ext" inline="true">
        <value name="TIMES">
          <block type="math_number">
            <title name="NUM">4</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="maze_untilBlocked">
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="maze_move">
                <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                <next>
                  <block type="maze_if">
                    <title name="DIR">isPathRight</title>
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="procedures_callnoreturn" id="function">
                        <mutation name="move and check"/>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="maze_turn">
                <title name="DIR">turnLeft</title>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
  <block type="procedures_defnoreturn" editable="false" usercreated="true">
    <mutation/>
    <title name="NAME">check nectar or honey</title>
    <statement name="STACK">
      <block type="bee_ifElseFlower">
        <title name="LOC">atFlower</title>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="bee_whileNectarAmount">
            <title name="ARG1">nectarRemaining</title>
            <title name="OP">></title>
            <title name="ARG2">0</title>
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="maze_nectar"/>
            </statement>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <statement name="ELSE">
          <block type="bee_whileNectarAmount">
            <title name="ARG1">honeyAvailable</title>
            <title name="OP">></title>
            <title name="ARG2">0</title>
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="maze_honey"/>
            </statement>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
  <block type="procedures_defnoreturn" deletable="false" movable="false" editable="false">
    <mutation/>
    <title name="NAME">move and check</title>
    <statement name="STACK">
      <block type="controls_repeat_ext" inline="true">
        <value name="TIMES">
          <block type="math_number">
            <title name="NUM">2</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="procedures_callnoreturn">
            <mutation name="check nectar or honey"/>
            <next>
              <block type="maze_turn">
                <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
                <next>
                  <block type="maze_untilBlocked">
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_move">
                        <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="maze_turn">
                        <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </statement>
  </block>
</xml>

course3_collector_debugging_challenge2.courseD_collector_debugging_challenge2_d:
Bu boshqotirmaning to‘liq yechimi mana shu.

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="controls_repeat">
        <title name="TIMES">4</title>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="controls_repeat">
            <title name="TIMES">4</title>
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="controls_repeat">
                <title name="TIMES">2</title>
                <statement name="DO">
                  <block type="maze_move">
                    <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                    <next>
                      <block type="controls_repeat">
                        <title name="TIMES">2</title>
                        <statement name="DO">
                          <block type="collector_collect"/>
                        </statement>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="maze_move">
                    <title name="DIR">moveBackward</title>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="maze_turn">
                <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

Ba'zi hayvonlar boshqalarga qaraganda ko'proq ball bersin.
Turli xil tovushlardan foydalaning.
Hayvonlarning kayfiyatini o'zgartiring!

courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_a:
Jami 6 ta uchburchak chizishingiz kerak bo'ladi. Har bir uchburchakni tugatgandan so'ng, 60 daraja aylantiring va keyingi uchburchakni boshlash uchun harakat qiling.

![](https://images.code.org/ad6c6d98298df9f4e3cea5bbe5ec776e-image-1497476332024.2_solution2.gif)
courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_b: Agar siz uchburchakni tsikl bilan yaratadigan bo'lsangiz, rassom ular boshlagan yo'l bilan qaragan bo'lishi kerak. Bu 60 daraja burilishni ancha osonlashtiradi.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_c: Agar siz ranglarni xohlasangiz, kodingizdagi "set color" blokidan foydalaning. Shablon rasmidagi ranglarga mos kelishingiz shart emas.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_2018.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_b: Agar siz uchburchakni tsikl bilan yaratadigan bo'lsangiz, rassom ular boshlagan yo'l bilan qaragan bo'lishi kerak. Bu 60 daraja burilishni ancha osonlashtiradi.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_2018.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_c: Agar siz ranglarni xohlasangiz, kodingizdagi "set color" blokidan foydalaning. Shablon rasmidagi ranglarga mos kelishingiz shart emas.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_2018.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_a:
Jami 6 ta uchburchak chizishingiz kerak bo'ladi (maslahat: boshlash uchun oxirgi jumboqdagi kodingizdan foydalaning). Har bir uchburchakni tugatgandan so'ng, 60 daraja aylantiring va keyingi uchburchakni boshlash uchun harakat qiling.

![](https://images.code.org/ad6c6d98298df9f4e3cea5bbe5ec776e-image-1497476332024.2_solution2.gif)

courseD_artist_nestedLoops2.courseD_artist_nestedLoops2_a: O'zingizning uchburchak kodingizdagi tsikllarni  boshqa "repeat" tsikli bilan o'rang.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops2.courseD_artist_nestedLoops2_b: Rassom har uchburchakdan keyin aylanishi uchun tsiklning ichiga "burilish" blokini qo'yishni unutmang.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops2_2018.courseD_artist_nestedLoops2_a: O'zingizning uchburchak kodingizdagi tsikllarni  boshqa "repeat" tsikli bilan o'rang.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops3.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_a:
Bir kvadrat tepasidan keyingisini boshlaydigan joyga yetib borish uchun "oldinga sakrash" blokidan foydalanib ko'ring. 

 Agar sizning kvadratchalaringiz balandligi 20 piksel bo'lsa va ular bir-biridan 20 piksel bo'lsa, sizga qancha sakrash kerak?
courseD_artist_nestedLoops3.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_b: Ushbu jumboqni tezda hal qilish uchun ichki tsikldan foydalanishni unutmang.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops3.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_c: Bir kvadrat hosil qilish uchun "repeat" tsikli yordamida boshlang. Keyin, ushbu kvadratni 8 marta takrorlang va orasiga 40 piksel sakrab chiqing.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_2018.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_a:

courseD_artist_nestedLoops7.courseD_artist_nestedLoops7_a: Bu yerda ichki tsikldan foydalanishingiz kerak. Birinchidan, kvadrat chizish uchun tsikldan foydalaning. Ichki tsikl kvadrat chizsa, tashqi tsikl nima qiladi?
courseD_artist_nestedLoops7.courseD_artist_nestedLoops7_b:
Ichki tsikl kvadrat uchun kod bo'lgan ichki o'rnatilgan tsikldan foydalaning. 

-   6 marta takrorlang 
-   kvadrat hosil qiling 
-   \*\* 50 pikselga oldinga sakrang \*\* 
-   \*\* 60 darajaga buriling \*\*

-   \*\* 50 pikselga oldinga sakrang \*\* 
-   \*\* 60 darajaga buriling \*\*

courseD_artist_nestedLoops_challenge1.courseD_artist_nestedLoops_challenge1_a: Rangni ko'k rangga o'zgartirib, keyin 50 pikselli va 45 daraja chap burilishli sakkizburchak yarating.

courseD_artist_ramp11.courseD_artist_ramp11b:

 Keyin burilishni unutmang!

courseD_artist_ramp12.courseD_artist_ramp12_a: Siz avval kvadratni, keyin uchburchakni chizishingiz yoki aksincha qilishingiz mumkin!
courseD_artist_ramp12.courseD_artist_ramp12_b: Muammoni 2 qismga ajratib ko'ring va 2 tsikldan foydalaning.
courseD_artist_ramp12.courseD_artist_ramp12_c: Kerakli burchakni tanlash uchun `turn` blokidagi pastga ochiladigan menyudan foydalaning!

courseD_bee_conditionals6.courseD_bee_conditionals6_hintVid1: Boshlashda yordam kerakmi? Videoni tomosha qiling!
courseD_bee_conditionals6.courseD_bee_conditionals6_a: Har bir bulut ostida asalari ini mavjudligini tekshirish uchun "if" iborasidan foydalanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling.
courseD_bee_conditionals6.courseD_bee_conditionals6_b: Bunday holda, bulutlar ostida gullarni tekshirishning hojati yo'q.
courseD_bee_conditionals6.courseD_bee_conditionals6_c: Kodingizni soddalashtirish uchun foydalanishingiz mumkin bo'lgan tsikl bormi?
courseD_bee_conditionals6.courseD_bee_conditionals6_hintVid2: Ushbu jumboqni yechishda yordam olish uchun ushbu videoni tomosha qiling.

courseD_bee_conditionals7.courseD_bee_conditionals7_hintVid1: Boshlashda yordam kerakmi? Videoni tomosha qiling!
courseD_bee_conditionals7.courseD_bee_conditionals7_a:
\*\* Esingizda bo'lsin: \*\* Ushbu jumboq har safar ishlatilganda o'zgarib turadi.  

Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli blokdan foydalanishni xohlaysiz ("if / else").
courseD_bee_conditionals7.courseD_bee_conditionals7_b: Agar bulut ostida gul bo'lmasa, unda asalari ini bo'lishi kerak, shuning uchun bo'sh joy haqida o'ylashning hojati yo'q.
courseD_bee_conditionals7.courseD_bee_conditionals7_hintVid2: Ushbu jumboqni yechishda yordam olish uchun ushbu videoni tomosha qiling.

courseD_bee_conditionals7_predict2.courseD_bee_conditionals7_a:
\*\* Esingizda bo'lsin: \*\* Ushbu jumboq har safar ishlatilganda o'zgarib turadi.  

Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli blokdan foydalanishni xohlaysiz ("if / else").

courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_hintVid1: Boshlashda yordam kerakmi? Videoni tomosha qiling!
courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_a: \*\* Esingizda bo‘lsin: \*\* Ushbu boshqotirma har safar ishlatilganda o‘zgarib turadi. Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli bo‘lakdan foydalanishingiz kerak (`if` yoki `if/else`).
courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_b:
Ushbu boshqotirma juda chalg‘itadigan turidan, chunki bitta shartli ifoda bilan bo‘sh kvadratlar, nektar va asalni mavjudligini tekshirib bo‘lmaydi.

  Faqat yo‘lingiz oxirida nektar va asal mavjudligini tekshiring.
courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_c: Qanday qilib yo'l qancha uzoq bo'lishidan qat'i nazar, har bir yo'lni oxirigacha sayohat qilishingizga ishonch hosil qilishingiz mumkin?
courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_d:
Sizning oldingizda bulut bo'lsa ham, avval unga tashrif buyurishingiz shart emas. Kvadratning pastki o'ng qismida bulutdan boshlang.

![](https://images.code.org/166e71553edf23bf13ecd290a8e7e721-image-1501013509361.09.09.png)
courseD_bee_conditionals8.courseD_bee_conditionals8_hintVid2: Ushbu jumboqni yechishda yordam olish uchun ushbu videoni tomosha qiling.

courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_a: Hech bir daraxtga urmasdan har bir gul va asalga yetadigan yo'lni topa olasizmi? Eng yaxshi yo'l spiraldir.
courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_b: Ushbu jumboqda har bir bo'shliqda gul, asalari ini yoki hech narsa bo'lishi mumkin. Demak, har bir kvadrat bo'yicha siz "if / else" shartini takrorlashingiz mumkin.

courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge2.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_b:
Xuddi "if at flower" bloklari singari,"while nectar> 0 " ichidagi kod faqat ari gulda bo'lganida ishlaydi. Farqi shundaki, ichkaridagi kod nektar qolmaguncha qayta-qayta ishlaydi. Ushbu namunani sinab ko'ring:

<xml>  <block type="bee_whileNectarAmount">
    <title name="ARG1">nectarRemaining</title>
    <title name="OP">></title>
    <title name="ARG2">0</title>                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_nectar"/>
                    </statement>
  </block></xml>

courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1a.courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1_a: Dasturning birinchi yarmi nimaga ishlamoqda? Asalari nima sababdan orgaqag harakat qilishi kerakligi haqida o‘ylab ko‘ring. U har safar gul ustidan yurganda qancha nektar asal yig‘adi?
courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1a.courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1_b: Ushbu jumboqni hal qilish uchun asalarilar nektar yig'ishda qilgan namunaga asalini yasash uchun rioya qilishlarini so'rang.
courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1a.courseD_bee_debugging_challenge1_c:
Ari pastki qatordan o'tgandan so'ng, quyidagi buyruqlarni takrorlang:

<xml><block type="controls_repeat">
                    <title name="TIMES">2</title>
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_move">
                        <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_honey"/>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="maze_move">
                        <title name="DIR">moveBackward</title>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block></xml>

courseD_collector_nested_loops_challenge.courseD_collector_nested_loops_challenge: Bitta buyruqni yoki uzunroq buyruqlarni `takrorlash`ingiz mumkinligini unutmang. Hatto `takrorlash` kod bo‘lagini boshqa `takrorlash` kod bo‘lagini bilan takrorlashingiz mumkin!
To'rt marvaridni ikkitasini olish uchun zarur bo'lgandan ko'ra ko'proq bloklardan foydalanmasdan qanday qilib olish mumkinligini aniqlay olasizmi?

Quyidagi buyruqlarni sikllashtirish bilan boshlang:

<xml>
  <block type="maze_moveSouth">
    <next>
    <block type="collector_collect"></block>
    </next>
    </block>
</xml>
courseB_collector_loops_challenge1.courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_c:
Har bir yo'l o'rtasida Sharqqa ikki marta harakatlaning.

<xml>
  <block type="maze_moveEast"><next>
  <block type="maze_moveEast"></block></next></block>
  </xml>

Buni faqat 14 ta blok bilan qilish kerak. Yechimni ko'rish uchun yana bir marta maslahat tugmasini bosing.

          <block type="maze_moveSouth">

          </block>

            </next>
          </block>

      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

courseB_collector_loops_challenge2.courseB_collector_loops_challenge2_a: Agar biron bir narsa to'g'ri bo'lmasa, qo'rqmasdan yangidan boshlang. Taslim bo'lmang!
courseB_collector_loops_challenge2.courseB_collector_loops_challenge2_b:
Agar siz ushbu patternni takrorlasangiz, Laurel g'orning pastki qismidagi devorga urilmaydi!

<xml><block type="maze_moveEast">
            <next>
              <block type="collector_collect">
                <next>
                  <block type="maze_moveWest">
                    <next>
                      <block type="maze_moveWest">
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_moveSouth"/>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block></xml>

-   "uchburchak chizish" funksiyasini bajaring

courseE_bee_concept1.courseE_bee_concept1_a: Agar siz bu yerda ichki sikldan qanday foydalanishni tushunmayotgan bo'lsangiz, ko'rsatmalarni asta-sekin qog'ozga yozib ko'ring. Topilgan naqshlarni belgilab chiqing.

courseE_bee_concept1_2018.courseE_bee_concept1_a: Agar siz bu yerda ichki sikldan qanday foydalanishni tushunmayotgan bo'lsangiz, ko'rsatmalarni asta-sekin qog'ozga yozib ko'ring. Topilgan naqshlarni belgilab chiqing.

courseE_bee_concept2.courseE_bee_concept2_a: Bu yerda while sikli yordam beradimi?
courseE_bee_concept2.courseE_bee_concept2_d: Asalning > 0 ekanligini tekshirish uchun bo'sh joylarni ham tekshirishingiz mumkin.
courseE_bee_concept2.courseE_bee_concept2_b: Har bir yo'lning oxiriga o'tishda va har bir bo'shliqdan barcha asallarni yig'ishda "while" siklidan foydalanishingiz mumkin.
courseE_bee_concept2.courseE_bee_concept2_c: Har bir yo'ldan keyin asalari qaysi tomonga burilishi kerak?

courseE_bee_concept2_2018.courseE_bee_concept2_a: Bu yerda while sikli yordam beradimi?
courseE_bee_concept2_2018.courseE_bee_concept2_b: Har bir yo'lning oxiriga o'tishda va har bir bo'shliqdan barcha asallarni yig'ishda "while" siklidan foydalanishingiz mumkin.
courseE_bee_concept2_2018.courseE_bee_concept2_c: Har bir yo'ldan keyin asalari qaysi tomonga burilishi kerak?
courseE_bee_concept2_2018.courseE_bee_concept2_d: Ushbu `while` sikli yordamida siz bo'sh joylarni tekshirib, asal miqdori > 0 ekanligini tekshirib ko'rishingiz mumkin. Bu "asal tugamaguncha" sikli bilan bir xil ishlaydi.

courseE_bee_concept3.courseE_bee_concept3a_a: Ushbu boshqotirmani yechish uchun bir-birini ichiga joylashgan takrorlash sikllaridan foydalanib ko‘ring.
courseE_bee_concept3.courseE_bee_concept3a_b: Agar siklni qayerga qo'yishni bilmasangiz, kodingizni bosqichma-bosqich yozib ko'ring va patternlarni qidiring.
courseE_bee_concept3.courseE_bee_concept3a_c: Uchta gul guruhlari mavjud, shuning uchun tashqi "takrorlash" sikli uch marta takrorlanishi kerak.

courseE_bee_concept3_2018.courseE_bee_concept3a_b: Agar siklni qayerga qo'yishni bilmasangiz, kodingizni bosqichma-bosqich yozib ko'ring va patternlarni qidiring.
courseE_bee_concept3_2018.courseE_bee_concept3a_a: Ushbu boshqotirmani yechish uchun bir-birini ichiga joylashgan `repeat` yoki `while` sikllaridan foydalanib ko‘ring.

courseE_bee_concept4.courseE_bee_concept4_a: Bu yerda "if/else" bayonoti sizga yordam berishi mumkin.
courseE_bee_concept4.courseE_bee_concept4_b: Zinapoya naqshi barcha gullar va chuqurchalar orqali o'tishga yordam beradi.
courseE_bee_concept4.courseE_bee_concept4_c: Agar siz gulzorda bo'lsangiz, necha marta nektar olishingiz kerak? Bu barcha gullar uchun bir xilmi?

courseE_bee_concept4_2018.courseE_bee_concept4_a: Bu yerda "if/else" bayonoti sizga yordam berishi mumkin.
courseE_bee_concept4_2018.courseE_bee_concept4_b: Zinapoya naqshi barcha gullar va chuqurchalar orqali o'tishga yordam beradi.
courseE_bee_concept4_2018.courseE_bee_concept4_c: Agar siz gulzorda bo'lsangiz, necha marta nektar olishingiz kerak? Bu barcha gullar uchun bir xilmi?

courseE_bee_concept5.courseE_bee_concept5_a: Gullar to'rtburchak yo'llar bo'ylab joylashgan. Siz to'rtburchakni har ikki tomonning har xil sonli raqamlari bilan ham "oldinga yo'l bo'lguncha" yordamida o'tishingiz mumkin.
courseE_bee_concept5.courseE_bee_concept5_c:
Mana, asalari o'tishi mumkin bo'lgan to'rtburchakli yo'lning tasviri.

![](https://images.code.org/39554a528b5ed168737e846c161f00ee-image-1510202150660.33.23.png)
courseE_bee_concept5.courseE_bee_concept5_b: Har bir kvadratni "agar" blokidan foydalanib tekshirishingiz mumkin, hatto u yerda yo'qligini bilsangiz ham.

courseE_bee_concept5_2018.courseE_bee_concept5_a: Gullar to'rtburchak yo'llar bo'ylab joylashgan. Siz to'rtburchakni har ikki tomonning har xil sonli raqamlari bilan ham "oldinga yo'l bo'lguncha" yordamida o'tishingiz mumkin.
courseE_bee_concept5_2018.courseE_bee_concept5_c:
Mana, asalari o'tishi mumkin bo'lgan to'rtburchakli yo'lning tasviri.

![](https://images.code.org/39554a528b5ed168737e846c161f00ee-image-1510202150660.33.23.png)
courseE_bee_concept5_2018.courseE_bee_concept5_b: Har bir kvadratni "agar" blokidan foydalanib tekshirishingiz mumkin, hatto u yerda yo'qligini bilsangiz ham.

courseE_bee_functions1.courseE_bee_functions1_a: Chapga va o'ngga burilishlar asalari nuqtai nazaridan ekanligini unutmang.
courseE_bee_functions1.courseE_bee_functions1_b: Kodingizni qisqartirish uchun nektar yig'ishda "takrorlash" siklidan foydalaning.
courseE_bee_functions1.courseE_bee_functions1_c: Chapga va o'ngga burilishlar asalari nuqtai nazaridan ekanligini unutmang.

courseE_bee_functions10.courseE_bee_functions10_a: Asalning barchasini yig'ish uchun sizga "while" sikli kerak bo'ladi, chunki asal chuqurchalari har xil.
courseE_bee_functions10.courseE_bee_functions10_b: Funksiyangizga burilishlar va harakatlarni qo'shing, shunda asalari asosiy yo'lda bo'lganida uni chaqira olasiz.

courseE_bee_functions3.courseE_bee_functions3_a: Ushbu boshqotirma uchun sizning vazifangiz faqat nektar yig'ishi kerak, unda `move forward` yoki `turn` bloklari bo‘lmasligi kerak.
courseE_bee_functions3.courseE_bee_functions3_b: "Ishga tushganda" bloki ostida "5 tani olish" funktsiyasini chaqiring.
courseE_bee_functions3.courseE_bee_functions3_c: Sizning asosiy dasturingiz barcha harakatlarni boshqaradi, funksiya faqat asalari gulga yetib borganda kerak.

courseE_bee_functions4.courseE_bee_functions4_a: Yaratgan funksiyangiz yon yo‘llar bo‘ylab yurib, asalarini yana asosiy yo‘lga qaytarishi kerak. Ushbu qismni asosiy dasturingizga qo‘shishingiz shart emas.
courseE_bee_functions4.courseE_bee_functions4_b: Funksiyangizni chaqirish uchun yashil rangdagi `move and get nectar` - "harakatlanish va nektar olish" kod blokidan foydalaning.
courseE_bee_functions4.courseE_bee_functions4_c: Siz funksiyani o'zgartirishingiz shart emas, uni o'z dasturingizda ishlating.

courseE_bee_functions5.courseE_bee_functions5_a: Asosiy dasturni o'zgartirmasdan jumboqni yechadigan qilib funksiyani tahrir qiling.
courseE_bee_functions5.courseE_bee_functions5_c: "Oldinga siljish" blokini "orqaga harakat qilish" blokiga o'zgartirish mumkin. Yo'llarning oxirida orqaga burilish o'rniga undan foydalaning!
courseE_bee_functions5.courseE_bee_functions5_b:
Sizning funksiyangiz asalariga quyidagilarni qildirishi kerak:

-   burilish
-   oldinga yurish
-   barcha nektarlarni to'plash
-   orqaga qarab harakat qilish
-   boshlagan joyiga qaytish

courseE_bee_functions6.courseE_bee_functions6_a:
Agar jumboq qiyin bo'lib tuyulsa, funksiyangizni birma-bir tuzishga harakat qiling.

Bir nechta bloklarni qo'shing, so'ngra sinab ko'ring. Yana qo'shib sinab ko'ring. Sunday tez orada marraga yetib borasiz!

![](https://images.code.org/3875224b35889000a0998ca25cfa4ecf-image-1467996493914.gif)
courseE_bee_functions6.courseE_bee_functions6_b: Bu holda funksiya ichida harakatlanish yordam berishi mumkin, ammo barcha "move" bloklaringiz u yerda bo'lishi shart emas.

courseE_bee_functions8.courseE_bee_functions8_a: Sizning funksiyangiz faqat nektar to'plashi kerak bo'ladi. Takroriy sikl o'rniga while siklidan foydalanib ko'ring.
courseE_bee_functions8.courseE_bee_functions8_b: Barcha nektarni olishingizga ishonch hosil qilish uchun `while nectar > 0` blokidan foydalaning.
courseE_bee_functions8.courseE_bee_functions8_c: Sizning asosiy dasturingizga zinapoyali harakatlanish sxemasi kerak bo'ladi. Esingizda bo'lsa, asosiy dastur "ishga tushirilganda" bloki ostidagi koddir.

courseE_bee_functions9.courseE_bee_functions9_a: Siz ushbu jumboqda oxirgi jumboqdagi bilan bir xil funksiyadan foydalanishingiz mumkin. Sizga kerak bo'lgan yagona narsa, har bir gulga yetib borganda barcha nektarni yig'adigan funksiyani yaratishdir.
courseE_bee_functions9.courseE_bee_functions9_b: Ba'zi gullarning nektari qancha ekanligini bilsangiz ham, "while\`" sikli bitta funksiya ularning barchasi uchun ishlashiga imkon beradi.

courseE_farmer_concept1.courseE_farmer_concept1_b: Teshiklarga o'tish uchun zinapoyali qadam patternidan foydalanishingiz mumkin.

courseE_farmer_concept2.courseE_farmer_concept2_b: Bu yerda buriladigan, yo'lga tushadigan, qovoqlarni yig'adigan va asosiy gorizontal yo'lga qaytadigan funksiya foydali bo'lishi mumkin.

courseE_playLab_challenge1.courseE_playLab_challenge1_a:
O'yinchi o'yinda g'alaba qozonganida qilishingiz mumkin bo'lgan ba'zi narsalar:

-   Dinozavrni yo'q qiling.
-   Olmaxonlarni to'xtating.
-   Olmaxonlar va ritsarlarni xursand qiling.
-   Yangi fonni o'rnating.
-   Ritsarga yordam bergani uchun o'yinchiga minnatdorchilik bildiring.
-   Aktyorlarning barchasini yo'q qiling va "Siz yutdingiz!" xabarini chiqaring.
courseE_playLab_challenge1.courseE_playLab_challenge1_b:
O'yinchi o'yinda yutqazganida qilishingiz mumkin bo'lgan ba'zi narsalar:

-   Ritsarni yo'q qiling.
-   Olmaxonlarni xomush qiling.
-   Dinozavrga biror narsa gapirtiring.
-   Yangi fonni o'rnating.
-   Aktyorlarning barchasini yo'q qiling va "Siz yutqazdingiz!" xabarini chiqaring.

courseE_playLab_scaffold1.courseE_playLab_scaffold1_a: `set actor 1 to ??? image` - "1-aktyorni ??? rasmiga sozlang\` blokidan aktyorni sahnaga qo'shish uchun foydalanish mumkin.
courseE_playLab_scaffold1.courseE_playLab_scaffold1_b: Dastur boshida aktyoringiz paydo bo'lishi uchun "o'rnatilgan aktyor" blokini "ishga tushirilganda" ostiga qo'ying.
courseE_playLab_scaffold1.courseE_playLab_scaffold1_c: Sahnaga fon tanlash uchun `set ??? background` dan foydalaning.

courseE_playLab_scaffold2.courseE_playLab_scaffold1_a: Blok boshqaradigan yo'nalishni o'zgartirish uchun " \_\_\_\_ o'q bo'lganda" hodisasining ochiladigan menyusini torting.
courseE_playLab_scaffold2.courseE_playLab_scaffold1_b: Sizda har biri ostida harakatlanish yo'nalishi bilan to'rtta "o'q" hodisa bloklari bo'lishi kerak.
courseE_playLab_scaffold2.courseE_playLab_scaffold1_c: Tugatgandan so'ng siz oqahramoningizni o'q tugmachalari bilan siljita olishingiz kerak!

courseE_playLab_scaffold4.courseE_playLab_scaffold4_a: Ball qo'shish uchun "score point"dan foydalaning va olib tashlash uchun `remove point`dan foydalaning.

courseE_playLab_scaffold5.courseE_playLab_scaffold5_a: Ushbu darajani tugatish uchun siz g'alaba qozonishingiz yoki yutqazishingiz kerak. Tugatish uchun "g'alaba bilan tugash" yoki "mag'lubiyat bilan tugash" blokidan foydalaning.

iceage_click_hello.iceage_click_hello_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun `when clicked` - "bosilganda" hodisasiga bitta yoki bir nechta `actor 1 say` blokini qo'shing.

iceage_hello1.iceage_hello1_a: Jumboqni yechish uchun faqat bitta blok qo'shish kerak. Asboblar qutisidan `say` blokini tortib oling va uni ish maydonidagi 'ishga tushirilganda' hodisa blokiga ulang. So'ng `say` ichida "Salom!" deb yozing.

iceage_hello2.iceage_hello2_a: Jumboqni yechish uchun siz Sidga `actor 1 say` blokidan foydalanib biror narsa gapirtirishingiz kerak bo'ladi. Bundan tashqari, Manni `actor 2 say` bloki bilan biror narsa gapirtirishingiz kerak bo'ladi.

iceage_move_events.iceage_move_events_a: Jumboqni yechish uchun "\_\_\_ o'q bosilganda" hodisalarining har biri unga bog'liq bo'lgan `move actor 1` buyrug'iga ega bo'lishi kerak.

iceage_move_to_actor.iceage_move_to_actor_b: Chellenjdan o'tish uchun `when actor 1 touches actor 2` - 1-aktyor 2-aktyorga tegsa blokiga "play \_\_\_ sound" blokini ulang.
iceage_move_to_actor.iceage_move_to_actor_a: Ushbu jumboq uchun siz Diyegoni 200 pikselga tushirishingiz yoki Manni 200 pikselga ko'tarishingiz mumkin.

iceage_move_to_flag.iceage_hello3_a: Jumboqni yechish uchun "aktyor 1o'ngga 200 pikselga siljiydi" blokidan foydalaning.

iceage_repeat.iceage_repeat_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun `move actor 1 left` - "1-aktyorni chapga siljitish" va `move actor 1 right` -"1-aktyorni  o'ngga siljitish" bloklaridan foydalaning.

iceage_sound_and_points.iceage_sound_and_points_a: Siz `when actor 1 touches actor 2` - "aktyor 1 aktyor 2 bilan teginsa" hodisa ostiga ikkita blok qo'shishingiz kerak bo'ladi.
iceage_sound_and_points.iceage_sound_and_points_b: Ushbu darajadan o'tish uchun sizga `score a point` bloki va 'play \_\_\_\_ sound\` bloki kerak bo'ladi.

Dance_2019_01.challenges:
\*\* Ixtiyoriy chellenjlar \*\*

-   ijro etish uchun boshqa qo'shiqni tanlang.
-   Raqqosingizni yangi joyga ko'chiring.
-   Bir nechta raqqos yarating.
Dance_2019_01.validation:
\*\* Men bu bosqichdan qanday o'taman? \*\*

-   Ekranda raqqos paydo bo'lishiga ishonch hosil qiling.

_Bu bosqich 4 o'lchovdan so'ng tugaydi._

Dance_2019_02.validation:
\*\* Men bu bosqichdan qanday o'taman? \*\*

-   Raqqos harakatni amalga oshirishi kerak.
-   Siz o'q tugmachasini bosishingiz kerak.

_Bu bosqich 4 o'lchovdan so'ng tugaydi._
Dance_2019_02.challenges:
\*\* Ixtiyoriy Chellenj \*\*

Birdan ortiq <xml><block type="Dancelab_whenKey"><title name="KEY"></title></block></xml> blokdan foydalaning.

Dance_2019_03.validation:
\*\* Men bu bosqichdan qanday o'taman? \*\*

-   Ikki raqqos harakatni amalga oshirishi kerak.
-   Siz o'q tugmachasini bosishingiz kerak.

_Bu bosqich 6 o'lchovdan so'ng tugaydi._
Dance_2019_03.challenges:
\*\* Ixtiyoriy Chellenj \*\*

-   Raqqos chap va o'ng o'q tugmachalari bosilishiga javob bersin.

Dance_2019_05.challenges:
\*\* Ixtiyoriy Chellenj \*\*

-   Raqqoslar harakatlari almashganda fonni o'zgartiring.
Dance_2019_05.validation:
\*\* Men bu bosqichdan qanday o'taman? \*\*

-   6 o'lchovdan so'ng, sizning raqqosingiz 4 o'lchovdan keyingi raqsdan boshqa raqsga tushishi kerak.

_Bu bosqich 11 o'lchovdan so'ng tugaydi._

Dance_2019_06.validation:
\*\* Men bu bosqichdan qanday o'taman? \*\*

-   Qo'shiqning dastlabki 4 o'lchovi doirasida bitta yetakchi raqqos va orqa saf raqqoslari guruhini yarating.

_Bu daraja 7 o'lchovdan so'ng tugaydi._
Dance_2019_06.challenges:
\*\* Ixtiyoriy Chellenj \*\*

-   Orqa saf raqqoslarining bir nechta guruhlarini yarating.

Dance_2019_07.validation:
\*\* Men bu bosqichdan qanday o'taman? \*\*

-   Kamida bitta raqqosning o'lchamini o'zgartiring.

_Bu bosqich 6 o'lchovdan so'ng tugaydi._
Dance_2019_07.challenges:
\*\* Ixtiyoriy Chellenj \*\*

-   kenglik yoki aylanish kabi boshqa xususiyatlarni o'zgartirib, tajriba qiling.

Dance_2019_08.validation:
\*\* Men bu bosqichdan qanday o'taman? \*\*

-   Kamida bitta raqqosning "tint" - tusini o'zgartiring.

_Bu bosqich 6 o'lchovdan so'ng tugaydi._
Dance_2019_08.tint_hint: Sizning raqqoslaringiz siz tanlagan rangga o'zgarmasligini payqadingizmi? Buning sababi shundaki, \*\* tints \*\* siz tanlagan rangni raqqos ranglari bilan aralashtirib yuboradi.

Dance_2019_09.validation:
\*\* Men bu bosqichdan qanday o'taman? \*\*

-   Faqat "Finish" tugmasini bosing!
Dance_2019_09.repeat_every_ideas:
\*\* Fikr kerakmi? \*\*

-   Raqqos o'sishi uchun uning hajmini bir necha bor o'zgartiring.
-   Raqqos takroriy aylanishini uchun uni aylanish xususiyatini bir necha bor o'zgartiring.

\_ Siz teskari effekt yaratish uchun manfiy sonlardan ham foydalanishingiz mumkin! \_

<xml>

Ushbu "sakrab o'tish" bloki zombi rassomini istalgan vaqtda katakchaning istalgan pikseliga ko'chirishga imkon beradi. Uni bir nechta piksel o'ngga va bir nechta piksel pastga siljitish orqali ishlaydi. Bu har doim yuqori chap burchakdan hisoblanadi, demak, zombi rassomi buyruqni qayerda bajarishi muhim emas!

course3_artist_functions_challenge2.courseE_artist_functions_challenge1_a:
<xml>
  <block type="jump_to_xy">
    <title name="XPOS">350</title>
    <title name="YPOS">200</title>
  </block>
  </xml>

Ushbu "sakrab o'tish" bloki zombi rassomini istalgan vaqtda katakchaning istalgan pikseliga ko'chirishga imkon beradi. Uni bir nechta piksel o'ngga va bir nechta piksel pastga siljitish orqali ishlaydi. Bu har doim yuqori chap burchakdan hisoblanadi, demak, zombi rassomi buyruqni qayerda bajarishi muhim emas!

course3_playLab_challenge1.courseE_playLab_challenge1_a:
O'yinchi o'yinda g'alaba qozonganida qilishingiz mumkin bo'lgan ba'zi narsalar:

-   Dinozavrni yo'q qiling.
-   Olmaxonlarni to'xtating.
-   Olmaxonlar va ritsarlarni xursand qiling.
-   Yangi fonni o'rnating.
-   Ritsarga yordam bergani uchun o'yinchiga minnatdorchilik bildiring.
-   Aktyorlarning barchasini yo'q qiling va "Siz yutdingiz!" xabarini chiqaring.
course3_playLab_challenge1.courseE_playLab_challenge1_b:
O'yinchi o'yinda yutqazganida qilishingiz mumkin bo'lgan ba'zi narsalar:

-   Ritsarni yo'q qiling.
-   Olmaxonlarni xomush qiling.
-   Dinozavrga biror narsa gapirtiring.
-   Yangi fonni o'rnating.
-   Aktyorlarning barchasini yo'q qiling va "Siz yutqazdingiz!" xabarini chiqaring.

iceage_free_play.iceage_free_play_a: Sid va Menni bilan Ice Crystal fight jangini o'tkaza olasizmi?
iceage_free_play.iceage_free_play_b: Buvijon Diegoni quvib chiqarsin. Agar u uni ushlasa, o'yinni g'alaba bilan yakunlang.
iceage_free_play.iceage_free_play_c: Sid Diegoga qorparchalarni tashlashi va Diego har safar kattalashib boradigan qila olasizmi? Diego 5 marta zarba olsa, o'yinni g'alaba bilan yakunlang.

iceage_throw_hearts.iceage_throw_hearts_a: Buvijonga yuraklarni qachon tashlamoqchisiz? O'q bosilgandami? Sidni bosganingizdami? Granny -Buvijonni bosganingizdami? Tanlov sizniki!
iceage_throw_hearts.iceage_throw_hearts_b: Buvijon yurak olganda xursand bo'lishi uchun siz `set actor 2 mood to happy` aktyor 2 kayfiyatini baxtli qilish blokini `when actor 2 touches projectile` bilan ostidan bog'lashingiz kerak bo'ladi.

iceage_warn_ice_age.iceage_warn_ice_age_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun kerakli joyda faqat ikkita blok qo'shishingiz kerak.

\_ Siz teskari effekt yaratish uchun manfiy sonlardan ham foydalanishingiz mumkin! \_

    </block></xml>

CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_10_2021.voyage_aquatic_10a: **Dengiz chiroqlari** ![](https://images.code.org/471b33234222ddffb463aeb65de6b371-image-1539183353423.net-resizeimage.png)ni ko'ryapsizmi? Okean yodgorligidan o'tish uchun ular bilan shartli bayonotlardan qanday foydalanishingiz mumkin?

CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_7a_2021.aquatic7: To'g'ri tarafga burilishga uchun "yo'l bo'lsa" blokidan foydalanishingiz mumkin.

CourseE_HOC 2018 Level_9b_2021.voyage_aquatic_9a: Qizil va ko'k marjon bloklarini ko'ryapsizmi? Rif orqali o'ngga va chapga burilish uchun ulardan orientir sifatida foydalaning.

CourseF_outbreak1.step1:
Sprayt yaratish uchun ushbu bloklardan foydalaning:

<xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites">
      <title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"healthy"</title>
      <value name="NUM">
        <block type="math_number">
          <title name="NUM">10</title>
        </block>
      </value>
    </block></xml>

<xml><block type="gamelab_makeNumSprites">
      <title name="ANIMATION_NAME">"sick"</title>
      <value name="NUM">
        <block type="math_number">
          <title name="NUM">1</title>
        </block>
      </value>
    </block></xml>

Ushbu blok asboblar qutisining \*\* Sprites \*\* toifasida joylashgan.
CourseF_outbreak1.step2:
Spraytlarning o'lchamini ushbu blok bilan o'zgartiring:  <xml><block type="gamelab_setProp"><title name="PROPERTY">"scale"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_getAllSprites"/></value><value name="VAL"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">50</title></block></value></block></xml>.

U asboblar qutisining \*\* Amallar \*\* toifasida joylashgan.
CourseF_outbreak1.step3:
Barcha spraytni aylanib yurdirishni boshlang: <xml><block type="gamelab_addBehaviorSimple" uservisible="false"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_getAllSprites"></block></value><value name="BEHAVIOR"><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">wandering</title></block></value></block></xml>.

Ushbu blok asboblar qutisining **Xatti-harakatlar** toifasida joylashgan.

CourseF_outbreak2.hint1:
Hodisalar blokidagi "+" tugmasini bosing. "Kostyumni o'zgartirish" blokidagi bo'sh joyni ichidagi "mavzu" bloki bilan to'ldiring.

<xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE1"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title></block></value><value name="SPRITE2"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>

CourseF_outbreak3.hint1:
Monstrlar niqobini berish uchun "kostyumni o'zgartirish" bloki va "bosilganda" tadbiridan foydalaning:

<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy_mask"</title></block></next></block></xml>

Kichik qizil "bosilgan" blokini ham olib borishni unutmang!
CourseF_outbreak3.hint2:
Ushbu darajadagi yangi kod quyidagicha ko'rinishi kerak:

<xml><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"healthy_mask"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_clickedSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block><block type="gamelab_spriteClicked"><title name="CONDITION">"when"</title><value name="SPRITE"><block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title></block></value><next><block type="gamelab_setAnimation"><title name="ANIMATION">"sick_mask"</title><value name="THIS"><block type="gamelab_clickedSpritePointer"></block></value></block></next></block></xml>

CourseF_outbreak4.challenge:
## Qo'shimcha topshiriq xphlaysizmi?

Bundan tashqari, siz monstrlarni tezroq yoki sekinroq harakatga keltirishingiz mumkin.

1.  Ushbu blokdagi "Tahrirlash" tugmasini bosing <xml><block type="gamelab_behavior_get"><mutation></mutation><title name="VAR">wandering</title></block></xml>
2.  Ushbu blokdagi raqamni oshirish yoki kamaytirish:

 <xml><block type="gamelab_moveForward"><value name="SPRITE"><block type="sprite_parameter_get"><title name="VAR">this sprite</title></block></value><value name="DISTANCE"><block type="math_number"><title name="NUM">1</title></block></value></block>
</xml>

Monstrlar sekinroq harakatlanishi uchun "0,5" yoki "0,25" kabi kasr sonini tanlang. Ularni tezroq harakatlantirish uchun 1 dan kattaroq raqamni tanlang.

CourseF_outbreak6.hint2:
Boshqa "harakat" bloklarini "if chance" blokining ichki qismiga o'tkazganingizga ishonch hosil qiling:

<xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching">
    <title name="CONDITION">"when"</title>
    <value name="SPRITE1">
      <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
        <title name="ANIMATION">"healthy"</title>
      </block>
    </value>
    <value name="SPRITE2">
      <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
        <title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title>
      </block>
    </value>
    <next>
      <block type="gamelab_withPercentChanceDropdown">
      <title name="NUM">90</title>
        <statement name="STATEMENT">
          <block type="gamelab_setAnimation">
            <title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title>
            <value name="THIS">
              <block type="gamelab_subjectSpritePointer"></block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </statement>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>
CourseF_outbreak6.hint1:
Sog'lom va yuqtirilgan spraytlar o'rtasidagi "teginish"ning barcha mumkin bo'lgan kombinatsiyalarini tekshirish uchun yana 3 ta `when touches` hodisasini qo'shishingiz kerak.

<xml><block type="gamelab_checkTouching">
      <title name="CONDITION">"when"</title>
      <value name="SPRITE1">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <title name="ANIMATION">"healthy_mask"</title>
        </block>
      </value>
      <value name="SPRITE2">
        <block type="gamelab_allSpritesWithAnimation">
          <title name="ANIMATION">"sick"</title>
        </block>
      </value><next>
      <block type="gamelab_withPercentChanceDropdown">

CourseF_outbreak7.verionhistory: O'zingizni qotib qolgandek his qilyapsizmi? Siz har doim quyida joylashgan "Versiya tarixi" tugmachasini bosgan holda "Qayta boshlash"-ni tanlab, kodingizni tiklashingiz mumkin.

Function intro Ryan_2021.Function_intro_Ryan_b: Agar siz funksiyalarni to'g'ri chaqirsangiz, bu siz boradigan yo'l bo'ladi ...
Function intro Ryan_2021.Function_intro_Ryan_a: Siz o'z dasturingiz ichida bir necha marta funksiyani chaqirishingiz mumkin! Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun uni ikki marta chaqirib ko'ring.

MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY_2021.MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY_a: Asboblar qutisidan bitta "oldinga siljish" blokini ish maydoniga torting va uni "ishga tushirilganda" blokining ostiga biriktiring.
MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY_2021.MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY_b: Agent kodini ishga tushirish uchun "Ishga tushirish" tugmasini bosishni unutmang.
MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY_2021.MC_HOC_2017_01_RETRY_c: Agent barcha kodini ishlagandan so'ng, siz o'q tugmalari yordamida o'yinchini harakatlantirishingiz mumkin!

MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_a: Bosim plitasida turish uchun Agentni ikki qadam oldinga siljiting. Bunda o'yinchi uchun eshik ochiladi.
MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_b:
"Ishga tushirish" tugmasini bosing!

Kodingizni noto'g'ri bo'lsa ham ishlatishingiz mumkin. Nimasi noto'g'ri ekanligini tushunmaguningizcha kodingizni qayta-qayta ishlating va qayta tiklang.
MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_c: Agent eshikni ochgandan so'ng, o'yinchini xaritaga ko'chirish uchun o'q tugmalaridan foydalaning!
MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_02_Cole_d: Agent xaritada ko'rsatilgan yo'ldan borishiga ishonch hosil qiling!

MC_HOC_2017_03_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_03_Cole_a: Agentni bosim plitasiga olib borganingizdan so'ng, o'q tugmachalari yordamida o'yinchini kompass tomon yurdirishingiz mumkin!
MC_HOC_2017_03_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_03_Cole_b: Kod biroz uzoqroq tuyulyaptimi? "Takrorlash" siklidan foydalanib ko'ring va qarang uni qanday qilib qisqartirishni o'ylab topa olasizmi?

MC_HOC_2017_04POINT5_RYAN_2021.MC_HOC_2017_04POINT5_RYAN_b: Agent yo'nalishini o'zgartirish uchun "o'ngga burilish" blokidan foydalaning
MC_HOC_2017_04POINT5_RYAN_2021.MC_HOC_2017_04POINT5_RYAN_a: Agentga Aleks yoki Stivni boltaga o'tishga imkoniyat berish uchun faqat birinchi bosim plitasiga o'tish kerak.

MC_HOC_2017_04_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_04_Cole_a: Agent 7 marta "oldinga siljishi" kerak. Buni amalga oshirish uchun qanday qilib "takrorlash" siklidan foydalanishingiz mumkin?
MC_HOC_2017_04_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_04_Cole_c:
"Ishga tushirish" tugmasini bosing!

Kodingizni noto'g'ri bo'lsa ham ishlatishingiz mumkin. Nimasi noto'g'ri ekanligini tushunmaguningizcha kodingizni qayta-qayta ishlating va qayta tiklang.
MC_HOC_2017_04_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_04_Cole_b: Agent bosim plitasiga tushgandan so'ng, Agent o'yinchi uchun eshikni ochadi.

MC_HOC_2017_05_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_05_Cole_a: Siz sikl ichiga birdan ortiq kod satrini qo'yishingiz mumkinligini bilasizmi? Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun oldinga harakatlaning **va** taxtani takrorlash sikli ichiga qo'ying.
MC_HOC_2017_05_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_05_Cole_b: Daryodan Agentni olib boring, yo'lda ko'prik quring.

MC_HOC_2017_06_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_06_Cole_a: Ushbu sikl necha marta ishlaydi? U necha marta ishlashi _kerak_?
MC_HOC_2017_06_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_06_Cole_b: Agentga suv ustidan ko'prik qurishda yordam bering!

MC_HOC_2017_07_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_07_Cole_c: Agentga qilishi kerak bo'lgan narsa - Minecart-ga yo'lni tozalash.
MC_HOC_2017_07_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_07_Cole_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun "yo'lni tozalash" funksiyasi nimani anglatishini aniqlang va uni asboblar qutisidan kichik yashil "yo'lni tozalash" blokidan foydalanib kerak bo'lgancha chaqiring.
MC_HOC_2017_07_Cole_2021.MC_HOC_2017_07_Cole_b: Ushbu jumboqni yechishda sizga yordam bo'lishi uchun funksiyalar bloklarini asboblar qutisidagi boshqa bloklar bilan aralashtirib ko'ring.

MC_HOC_2017_10_RETRY_2021.MC_HOC_2017_10_Cole_b: Qayerga borishni bilmayapsizmi? Nuqtali chiziqni topa olasizmi, ko'ring!
MC_HOC_2017_10_RETRY_2021.MC_HOC_2017_10_Cole_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechishni osonlashtirish uchun funksiyalardan foydalaning!

MC_HOC_2017_Ali_2021.MC_HOC_2017_08_RY_a:
"Ishga tushirish" tugmasini bosing!

Kodingizni noto'g'ri bo'lsa ham ishlatishingiz mumkin. Nimasi noto'g'ri ekanligini tushunmaguningizcha kodingizni qayta-qayta ishlating va qayta tiklang.
MC_HOC_2017_Ali_2021.MC_HOC_2017_08_RY_b: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun juda ko'p usullar mavjud. Bir nechtasini sinab ko'ring!
MC_HOC_2017_Ali_2021.MC_HOC_2017_08_RY_c: Lavadan o'tish uchun oddiy yo'l sifatida ushbu nuqtali chiziqdan yurib ko'ring.

MC_HOC_2017_FP20x20_2021.MC_HOC_2017_13_Cole_a: Agent vagoncha treklarini tuzishiga harakat qilib ko'ring, shunda siz dunyoni o'rganishingiz mumkin bo'ladi!

Overworld Avoid Monsters_2021.mc_8_a: Bir nechta yo‘l bilan ketishingiz mumkin. Qaysi biri eng qisqa yo‘l?
Overworld Avoid Monsters_2021.mc_8_c: Maqsadingiz ekranning tepasida joylashgan uyning kirishiga yetib borish.

Overworld Chop Tree_2021.mc_2_a: Daraxtni oldida turishingiz uchun 2 marta oldinga harakat qilishingiz kerak.
Overworld Chop Tree_2021.mc_2_b: `destroy block` buyrug‘i daraxtni sizni qarshingizda chopib tashlaydi.

Overworld Chop Trees_2021.mc_4_a: Daraxtlarni istalgan tartibda chopib tashlashingiz mumkin. Qaysi yo‘l bilan eng kam bo‘laklardan foydalanilmoqda?
Overworld Chop Trees_2021.mc_4_b: `destroy block` buyrug‘i daraxtni sizni qarshingizda chopib tashlaydi.

Overworld House Frame Chosen_2021.mc_6_a: Nima joylashtirishni tanlash uchun `place` bo‘lagida kamon shaklidagi chiziqni bosing.
Overworld House Frame Chosen_2021.mc_6_b: Xato qilishdan qo‘rqmang! Bo‘laklarni qo‘shishga harakat qiling va nima sodir bo‘lishini ko‘rish uchun kodni ishga tushiring. Xattoki boshqotirma yechilmagan deb bilsangiz ham, uni ishga tushurib, sinab ko‘ring.
Overworld House Frame Chosen_2021.mc_6_c: `repeat` sikli ichiga birdan ko‘p bo‘lak joylashtirishingiz mumkin.

Overworld Move to Sheep_2021.mc_1_a: `move forward` bo‘lagi asboblar qutichasini tepasida joylashgan
Overworld Move to Sheep_2021.mc_1_b: Ikkala `move forward` bo‘laklari `when run` bo‘lagiga biriktirilganligiga ishonch hosil qiling.

Overworld Place Wall_2021.mc_5_a: Birinchi `place` bo‘lagini va undan so‘ng `move` bo‘lagini ishlating.
Overworld Place Wall_2021.mc_5_b: Yozgan kodingizni bir necha marta ishga tushirish uchun 2 ta bo‘lak ham `repeat` sikli ichida ekanligiga ishonch hosil qiling.
Overworld Place Wall_2021.mc_5_c: Xato qilishdan qo‘rqmang! Bo‘laklarni qo‘shishga harakat qiling va nima sodir bo‘lishini ko‘rish uchun kodni ishga tushiring. Xattoki boshqotirma yechilmagan deb bilsangiz ham, uni ishga tushurib, sinab ko‘ring.

Overworld Plant Crops_2021.mc_7_a: Turgan joyingizdagi joyga ekin ekish uchun `plant crop` bo‘lagini ishlating.
Overworld Plant Crops_2021.mc_7_b: Suv yonidagi to‘q jigarang chiziqli yerlarni ikkalasi ham ekinlar bilan to‘ldirilishi kerak.
Overworld Plant Crops_2021.mc_7_c: `repeat` sikli ichiga birdan ko‘p bo‘lak joylashtirishingiz mumkin.

Overworld Powered Minecart_2021.mc_13_a: Turgan to‘rtburchakga temir yo‘l joylashtirish uchun `place rail` buyrug‘ini ishlating

Overworld Shear Sheep_2021.mc_3_a: `shear` kod bo‘lagi qo‘yni oldingizga keltiradi. Qo‘yga yuzlanib turibsizmi?
Overworld Shear Sheep_2021.mc_3_b: Agarda qarab turgan yo‘nalishingizni o‘zgartirmoqchi bo‘lsangiz, `turn` bo‘ladini ishlating.
Overworld Shear Sheep_2021.mc_3_c: Xato qilishdan qo‘rqmang! Bo‘laklarni qo‘shishga harakat qiling va nima sodir bo‘lishini ko‘rish uchun kodni ishga tushiring. Xattoki boshqotirma yechilmagan deb bilsangiz ham, uni ishga tushurib, sinab ko‘ring.

Underground Avoiding Lava_2021.mc_11_a: Lava borligini tekshirish va u bilan bog‘liq muammoni hal qilish uchun barcha kod o‘z joyida. Sizdan harakatlanish uchun faqatgina bo‘lak qo‘shish talab qilinadi.
Underground Avoiding Lava_2021.mc_11_b: `move forward` buyrug‘i `if` ifodasini ichida bo‘lishi kerakmi yoki undan keyinmi?

Underground If Statements_2021.mc_12_a: Qizil dog‘li joylarda qizil toshlarni topasiz.
Underground If Statements_2021.mc_12_b: `repeat` siklidan foydalangan holda yozgan kodingizni qisqartira olasizmi?
Underground If Statements_2021.mc_12_c: Lava mavjud joylarni tekshirish uchun `if` ifodasini ishlating va so‘ngra toshni joylashtiring.

Underground Iron_2021.mc_10_a: Temir bo‘laklar masha‘l ortidagi qora dog‘lardir! U yerga qanday qilib yetib borasiz?
Underground Iron_2021.mc_10_b: Lava chekkasida turganingizda, havfsiz yo‘l yaratish uchun `place cobblestone ahead` buyrug‘idan foydalaning. So‘ngra ushbu yo‘l ustidan yursangiz bo‘ladi!
Underground Iron_2021.mc_10_c: Xato qilishdan qo‘rqmang! Bo‘laklarni qo‘shishga harakat qiling va nima sodir bo‘lishini ko‘rish uchun kodni ishga tushiring. Xattoki boshqotirma yechilmagan deb bilsangiz ham, uni ishga tushurib, sinab ko‘ring.

Underground Mining Coal_2021.mc_9_a: To‘g‘ri tomonga qarab turibsizmi? `destroy block` qarshingizdagi bo‘lakni yoq qilib yuboradi.
Underground Mining Coal_2021.mc_9_b: Devordagi qora dog‘lar - ko‘mir! Ularga `destroy bo‘lak` buyrug‘ini ishlatib ko‘mir qazib oling.
Underground Mining Coal_2021.mc_9_c: `place torch` buyrug‘i turgan joyingizga mash‘al joylashtiradi.

courseA_collector_loops_challenge1_2021.courseA_collector_loops_challenge1_d:
Dastlabki dastur oxirgi 2 ta qimmatbaho toshni yig'maydi. Eng oxirida ushbu kodni qo'shib ko'ring:

<xml><block type="maze_moveEast">
                        <next>
                          <block type="collector_collect_simplified">
                            <next>
                              <block type="maze_moveSouth">
                                <next>
                                  <block type="collector_collect"/>
                                </next>
                              </block>
                            </next>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block></xml>

courseA_collector_loops_challenge2kp_202.courseA_collector_loops_challenge2kp_b: Yechim topish uchun ushbu yo'lni sinab ko'ring.
courseA_collector_loops_challenge2kp_202.courseA_collector_loops_challenge2kp_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun sikldan foydalanishingiz mumkinmi?

courseA_harvester_loops1_2021.courseA_harvester_loops1_a:
Makka topilganda, uni olish uchun ushbu blokdan foydalaning!

<xml><block type="harvester_corn"/></xml>

courseA_harvester_loops2_2021.courseA_harvester_loops2_b: Agar hali ham muammo bo'lsa, qadamlarni baland ovoz bilan aytib ko'ring.
courseA_harvester_loops2_2021.courseA_harvester_loops2_a:
Kodingizda **to'rtta** "g'arbga yirish"

<xml><block type="maze_moveWest"/></xml> 

bloki va **to'rtta** <xml>
`pick corn`
  <block type="harvester_corn"/>
</xml> bloki bo'lish kerak.

courseA_harvester_loops3_2021.courseA_harvester_loops3_a:
Shunga o'xshash "takrorlash" blokidan foydalanib ko'ring!

<xml><block type="controls_repeat_simplified_dropdown">
    <title name="TIMES" config="2-10">4</title>
  </block></xml>
courseA_harvester_loops3_2021.courseA_harvester_loops3_b:
Kodni takrorlash uchun `repeat` (<xml><block type="controls_repeat_simplified_dropdown">
    <title name="TIMES" config="2-10">4</title>
  </block></xml> ) siklini olib keling, so‘ngra kerakli blokni ichiga qo‘ying

courseA_harvester_loops4_2021.courseA_harvester_loops4_a: Nima bo'lishini ko'rish uchun "Run" tugmachasini bosishdan qo'rqmang!
courseA_harvester_loops4_2021.courseA_harvester_loops4_b: U yerda qancha makka bor? Sizning kodingiz necha marta takrorlanadi?

courseA_harvester_loops5_2021.courseA_harvester_loops5_a: Agar bir joyda to'xtab qolsangiz, jumboqni 2 qismga bo'lib ko'ring, bir qismi burchakdan oldin va ikkinchisi burchakdan keyin bo'ladi.
courseA_harvester_loops5_2021.courseA_harvester_loops5_b:
Yakuniy kodingizda **bitta** `takrorlash` <xml><block type="controls_repeat_simplified_dropdown">
    <title name="TIMES" config="2-10">6</title>
    </block></xml> sikli, **bitta** `janubga yurish` <xml><block type="maze_moveSouth" limit="1"/></xml> bloki va **bitta** `sharqqa yurish` <xml><block type="maze_moveEast" limit="1"/> </xml> bo'ladi.
courseA_harvester_loops5_2021.courseA_harvester_loops5_c: Makkajo'xorini yig'ish uchun bu yo'ldan foydalaning!

courseA_harvester_loops5a_2021.courseA_harvester_loops5a_a:
Sizga `repeat` <xml> <block type="controls_repeat_simplified_dropdown">
    <title name="TIMES" config="2-10">6</title>
  </block></xml> sikli kerak bo‘ladi
courseA_harvester_loops5a_2021.courseA_harvester_loops5a_b: Bitta siklda "janubga yirish" <xml><block type="maze_moveSouth" limit="1"/></xml> takrorlanadi, ikkinchisi esa "sharqqa yirish" <xml><block type="maze_moveEast" limit="1"/></xml> takrorlanadi.
courseA_harvester_loops5a_2021.courseA_harvester_loops5a_c: Ushbu yo'ldan bir tomonga, so'ngra boshqasiga o'tish uchun foydalaning.

courseA_harvester_loops5b_2021.courseA_harvester_loops5b_a: "Bajar" tugmasini bosing va nima bo'lishini ko'ring!
courseA_harvester_loops5b_2021.courseA_harvester_loops5b_c: Ushbu yo'l bilan bir tomonga, so'ngra boshqasiga o'ting.

courseA_harvester_loops6_2021.courseA_harvester_loops6_a: Agar to‘xtab qolsangiz, qadamlarni qog’ozga yozib, takrorlanadigan qadamlarni qidirib ko‘ring.
courseA_harvester_loops6_2021.courseA_harvester_loops6_b: Makkani yig'ish uchun bu yo'lni tanlash kerak.

courseA_harvester_loops7_2021.courseA_harvester_loops7_a:
Sizga bir-biridan keyin ikkita "takrorlash" <xml><block type="controls_repeat_simplified_dropdown">
    <title name="TIMES" config="2-10">5</title>
  </block></xml>l sikli kerak bo'ladi!
courseA_harvester_loops7_2021.courseA_harvester_loops7_b: Ushbu yo'ldan yurish uchun ikkita sikldan foydalaning.

courseA_harvester_loops9_2021.courseA_harvester_loops9_a: Ushbu jumboqni uch qismga bo'ling. Bir qism birinchi burchakkacha, bir qism ikkinchi burchakkacha va bir qism oxirigacha bo'ladi.
courseA_harvester_loops9_2021.courseA_harvester_loops9_b: Natijani ko'rish uchun har bir qismdan keyin kodingizni ishlatib ko'ring!
courseA_harvester_loops9_2021.courseA_harvester_loops9_c: Makkajo'xorini yig'ish uchun bu yo'ldan yuring.

courseA_harvester_seq10_2021.courseA_harvester_seq10_a: Siz o'ylanib qoldingizmi? Avval qadamlarni qog'ozga yozib ko'ring.
courseA_harvester_seq10_2021.courseA_harvester_seq10_b: Siz "Sharqqa", keyin "Shimolga" o'tishingiz kerak. Buni ikki marta bajaring. Barcha makkajo'xori olishni ham unutmang!
courseA_harvester_seq10_2021.courseA_harvester_seq10_c: Makkajo'xorini yig'ish uchun bu yo'ldan foydalanib ko'ring.

courseA_harvester_seq13_2021.courseA_bee_seq1_a:
Makkajo'xori topilganda uni yig'ib olish uchun ushbu blokdan foydalaning!

<xml>
  <block type="harvester_corn"/>
</xml>

courseA_harvester_seq1_2021.courseA_harvester_seq1_a:
Makkajo'xori topilganda uni yig'ib olish uchun ushbu blokdan foydalaning!

<xml>
  <block type="harvester_corn"/>
</xml>
courseA_harvester_seq1_2021.courseA_harvester_seq1_b:
Makkajo'xoriga yetib borish uchun hosil yig'uvchi 3 marta G'arb tomon siljishi kerak. Ushbu blokdan foydalaning:

<xml>
  <block type="maze_moveEast"/>
</xml>

courseA_harvester_seq2_2021.courseA_harvester_seq2_a: Makkajo'xorini olish uchun <xml><block type="harvester_corn"/></xml> blokidan foydalanishni unutmang!
courseA_harvester_seq2_2021.courseA_harvester_seq2_b: Yechim topish uchun qadamlarni qog'ozga yozib ko'ring!

courseA_harvester_seq3_2021.courseA_harvester_seq3_b: Qadamlarni baland ovoz bilan ayting va javobni aniqlashga yordam berish-bermasligini tekshiring.

courseA_harvester_seq4_2021.courseA_harvester_seq4_a: Dehqon va makkajo'xori orasida qancha bo'sh joy bor? Sizning ish maydoningizda nechta blok mavjud?
courseA_harvester_seq4_2021.courseA_harvester_seq4_b:
Sizga beshta "Sharqqa siljish" va bitta "Makkajo'xori olish" bloklari kerak bo'ladi:

<xml><block type="harvester_corn"/></xml>

courseA_harvester_seq5_2021.courseA_harvester_seq5_a: Qaysi blok kombaynni noto'g'ri tomonga harakatlantiryapti?

courseA_harvester_seq6_2021.courseA_harvester_seq6_a: Agar siz qotib qolsangiz, qadamlarni baland ovoz bilan aytishga harakat qiling. Bu sizga to'g'ri yo'lni aniqlashga yordam berishi mumkin.

courseA_harvester_seq7_2021.courseA_harvester_seq7_a: Jumboqni 2 qismga bo'lib ko'ring, bir qismi burchakdan oldin va ikkinchisi burchakdan keyin bo'ladi.
courseA_harvester_seq7_2021.courseA_harvester_seq7_b: Muammo bormi? Bu dehqon o'tishi kerak bo'lgan yo'l.

courseA_harvester_seq8_2021.courseA_harvester_seq8_a: Oxirgi kodingizda \*\* 4 \*\* ta siljish bloki va \*\* 2 \*\* ta olish bloki bo'lishi kerak.

courseA_harvester_seq9_2021.courseA_harvester_seq9_a: Nima bo'lishini ko'rish uchun kodni bir necha marta ishlating. Terimchi qayerda to'xtaydi?
courseA_harvester_seq9_2021.courseA_harvester_seq9_b: Barcha makkajo'xorilarni yig'ishni unutmang! Sizga \*\* 3 \*\* ta makkajo'xori olish bloki kerak bo'ladi.
courseA_harvester_seq9_2021.courseA_harvester_seq9_c: Barcha makkajo'xorini yig'ish uchun siz ushbu yo'ldan yurishingiz kerak.

courseA_playLab_events2_2021.courseA_playLab_events2_b:
Ushbu jumboqni yechishingiz kerak bo'lgan kod:

<xml>
<block type="when_run" movable="false" deletable="false">
<next>
<block type="studio_saySpriteChoices">
    <title name="SPRITE">1</title>
    <title name="VALUE">Hi there.</title>
  </block>
</next>
</block>
</xml>

courseA_playLab_events3_2021.courseA_playLab_events3_a:
Ushbu blokni <xml><block type="studio_move">
    <title name="SPRITE">1</title>
    <title name="DIR">8</title>
  </block></xml> tortib olib <xml><block type="studio_whenArrow">
    <title name="VALUE">left</title>
  </block></xml>ning pastki qismiga joylang
courseA_playLab_events3_2021.courseA_playLab_events3_b: Dasturingizni yozib bo'lgach, Xorxeni bayroqqa o'tkazish uchun chap o'q tugmachasini ishlatishni unutmang. Bayroq yashil rangga aylanganda, siz tugatgan bo'lasiz!

courseA_playLab_events4_2021.courseA_playLab_events4_a: Xorxeni to'g'ri harakatga keltirishingiz kerak bo'lgan hodisalar bloki:
courseA_playLab_events4_2021.courseA_playLab_events4_b:
Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun kerak bo'lgan kod:

<xml><block type="studio_whenArrow">
    <title name="VALUE">right</title>
    <next>
  <block type="studio_move">
    <title name="SPRITE">1</title>
    <title name="DIR">2</title>
  </block></next></block></xml>

courseA_playLab_events5_2021.courseA_playLab_events5_a:
Xorxeni "yuqoriga" va "pastga" harakatlantirish uchun kerak bo'lgan hodisalar:

<xml><block type="studio_whenArrow">
    <title name="VALUE">up</title>
  </block></xml>

va 

<xml><block type="studio_whenArrow">
    <title name="VALUE">down</title>
  </block></xml>

courseB_Scrat_ramp1_2021.1: Agarda Skrat siz xohlagan narsaga yetib bora olmayotgan bo‘lsa, 2 ta bloklarni to‘liq biriktirilganligiga ishonch hosil qiling, so‘ngra "Run" tugamachasini qayta bosing.
courseB_Scrat_ramp1_2021.2: Xato qilishdan qo'rqmang! Biror narsani sinab ko'ring, agar u ishlamasa, boshqasini sinab ko'ring!
