courseB_artist_loops2_2021.courseB_artist_loops2_a: Agar sikldan 4 martadan ko'proq takrorlanishini istasangiz, blokning yuqori qismidagi raqamni o'zgartirishingiz mumkin.
courseB_artist_loops2_2021.courseB_artist_loops2_b: Rassom qayerda tugatishini bilish uchun avval kodni ishlatib ko‘ring.

courseB_artist_loops3_2021.courseB_artist_loops3_a:
Yaxshi kod uchun "takrorlash" `repeat` <xml><block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
    <title name="TIMES">???</title>
  </block></xml> siklidan foydalanishni unutmang!
courseB_artist_loops3_2021.courseB_artist_loops3_b: Rassom ushbu chiziqni chizish uchun Janubga harakat qilishni xohlaydi.

courseB_artist_loops4_2021.courseB_artist_loops4_a: Sakrash bloki chiziq chizmasdan oldinga siljish imkonini beradi.
courseB_artist_loops4_2021.courseB_artist_loops4_b: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun takrorlash siklning ichiga blok qo'shishingiz kerak bo'ladi.

courseB_artist_loops5_2021.courseB_artist_loops5_a:
"Takrorlash" `repeat` <xml><block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
    <title name="TIMES">???</title>
  </block></xml> siklini tortib, so'ngra boshqa bloklarni uning ichiga qo'ying. Siklni necha marta takrorlash kerak?

courseB_artist_loops6_2021.courseB_artist_loops6_b: Barcha harakatlarni qog’ozga yozib, pattern izlashga harakat qiling.

courseB_artist_loops7_2021.courseB_artist_loops7_a: Ushbu topshiriqda birin-ketin \*\* 4 \*\* ta sikldan foydalaniladi!
courseB_artist_loops7_2021.courseB_artist_loops7_b:
E'tibor bering, har bir sikl turli yo'nalishdagi zinapoya naqshini yaratadi.

![](https://images.code.org/7d08d5514766c5c15074e90731991505-image-1466705649513.gif)
courseB_artist_loops7_2021.courseB_artist_loops7_c:
Sikllar buni qilish kerak:

-   1-sikl
    -   To'g'riga
    -   pastga

-   2-sikl
    -   To'g'riga
    -   Yuqoriga

-   3-sikl
    -   Chapga
    -   Yuqoriga

-   4-sikl
    -   Chapga
    -   pastga

courseB_artist_loops8_2021.courseB_artist_loops8_a: Narvon qilish uchun naqshni necha marta takrorlash kerak?
courseB_artist_loops8_2021.courseB_artist_loops8_b: Sizga berilgan kod nima qilishini ko'rish uchun uni ishlatib ko'ring.

courseB_artist_loops9_2021.courseB_artist_loops9_a: Yodingizda tutingki, sakrash bloklari chiziq tortmasdan harakat qilish uchun ishlatilishi mumkin.
courseB_artist_loops9_2021.courseB_artist_loops9_b: Ushbu jumboqni hal qilish uchun siz W blokidan foydalanishni xohlaysiz.
courseB_artist_loops9_2021.courseB_artist_loops9_c: Siklni qayerga joylashni bilmayapsizmi? Kodni bitta ketma ketlikda yozib chiqing va o‘xshashliklarni qidirib ko‘ring.

courseB_artist_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_artist_loops_challenge1_a: Bunday bloklar <xml>  <block type="simple_move_up_right"/></xml> sizning rassomingizni o'gmali harakatlanishiga imkon beradi!
courseB_artist_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_artist_loops_challenge1_c: Sizga bir xil chiziqlardan ikki marta "o'tish" yoki "sakrash" kerak bo'ladi.

courseB_artist_loops_challenge2_2021.courseB_artist_loops_challenge2_a: X chizish uchun kod sizga oldindan berilgan. Sizga X-ni takrorlash va keyingi joyga o'tish kerak.
courseB_artist_loops_challenge2_2021.courseB_artist_loops_challenge2_b: Keraksiz joylarga chizmasdan o'tish uchun sakrash "jump" bloklaridan foydalanishingiz mumkin.

courseB_collector_loops10_2021.courseB_collector_loops10_a: Agar takrorlash sikllarni qayerga qo'yishni bilmasangiz, kodni bosqichma-bosqich yozing va pattern izlang.
courseB_collector_loops10_2021.courseB_collector_loops10_b: Barcha harakatlarni qog’ozga yozib, pattern izlashga harakat qiling.

courseB_collector_loops1_2021.courseB_collector_loops1_a: <xml><block type="collector_collect_simplified"/></xml> bloki siz uning ustida turganingizda xazinani olish uchun ishlatilishi mumkin.

courseB_collector_loops2_2021.courseB_collector_loops2_a: Biron bir xazina to'plashdan oldin siz harakat qilishingiz kerak.
courseB_collector_loops2_2021.courseB_collector_loops2_b: Xazina bilan maydonda turganingizda, uni olish uchun <xml><block type="collector_collect"/></xml> blokidan foydalaning.

courseB_collector_loops3_2021.courseB_collector_prog3_a: Xazinangizni yig'ish uchun <xml><block type="controls_repeat_simplified_dropdown"><title name="TIMES" config="3-10">5</title></block></xml> blokidan foydalanishga harakat qiling.
courseB_collector_loops3_2021.courseB_collector_prog3_b: Takrorlash sikli ichiga birdan ko‘p blok joylashtirish mumkinligini unutmang.

courseB_collector_loops4_2021.courseB_collector_loops4_a: Qayerda xato bo'lganini aniqlash uchun qadam tugmachasini ishlatib ko'ring.
courseB_collector_loops4_2021.courseB_collector_loops4_b: Laurel bosib o'tadigan masofani o'zgartirish uchun siklning necha marta ishlashini o'zgartiring.
courseB_collector_loops4_2021.courseB_collector_loops4_c:
Laurel `repeat` <xml><block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
    <title name="TIMES">???</title>
  </block></xml> siklini tugatganda pastga yurib, xazinani olishi kerak!

courseB_collector_loops5_2021.courseB_collector_loops5_a: Ishni bajarish uchun bir nechta sikldan foydalaning.
courseB_collector_loops5_2021.courseB_collector_loops5_b: Nima bo'lishini ko'rish uchun kodni bir necha marta ishlatib ko'ring.

courseB_collector_loops6_2021.courseB_collector_loops6_a: Qayerda xato borligini bilmayapsizmi? Dasturni birma-bir bajarish uchun "Qadam" tugmasidan foydalaning.
courseB_collector_loops6_2021.courseB_collector_loops6_b: "3" tugmasini bosish va boshqa raqamni tanlash orqali takrorlash siklning necha marta ishlashini sozlash mumkin.
courseB_collector_loops6_2021.courseB_collector_loops6_c:
Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun 3 ta `repeat` <xml><block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
    <title name="TIMES">???</title>
  </block></xml> siklidan foydalanishni xohlaysiz.
courseB_collector_loops6_2021.courseB_collector_loops6_d: Agar chalkashib ketgan bo'lsangiz, ushbu jumboqni 3 qismga bo'lib ko'ring.

courseB_collector_loops7_2021.courseB_collector_loops7_a: Agar jumboq bilan qiynalayotgan bo'lsangiz, uni osonroq tushunish uchun qog'ozga chizib ko'ring.
courseB_collector_loops7_2021.courseB_collector_loops7_b: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun sizga 3 ta takrorlash sikli kerak bo'ladi va oxirida qo'shimcha xazinani olishni unutmang!

courseB_collector_loops8_2021.courseB_collector_loops8_challenge_a: Agar takrorlash sikllarni qayerga qo'yishni bilmasangiz, kodni bosqichma-bosqich yozing va pattern izlang.

courseB_collector_loops9_2021.courseB_collector_loops9_a: Bu o'ta qiyin tuyuldimi? Uni osonlashtirish uchun uchta kichik masalaga ajrating.
courseB_collector_loops9_2021.courseB_collector_loops9_b: Ushbu yechim uchun sizga ketma-ket uchta takrorlash sikli kerak bo'ladi.

courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_b:
Quyidagi buyruqlarni sikllashtirish bilan boshlang:

<xml>
  <block type="maze_moveSouth">
    <next>
    <block type="collector_collect"></block>
    </next>
    </block>
</xml>
courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_c:
Har bir yo'l o'rtasida Sharqqa ikki marta harakatlaning.

<xml>
  <block type="maze_moveEast"><next>
  <block type="maze_moveEast"></block></next></block>
  </xml>

Buni faqat 14 ta blok bilan qilish kerak. Yechimni ko'rish uchun yana bir marta maslahat tugmasini bosing.
courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_2021.courseB_collector_loops_challenge1_d:
Buni sinab ko'ring!

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
        <title name="TIMES">5</title>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="maze_moveSouth">
            <next>
              <block type="collector_collect"/>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <next>
          <block type="maze_moveEast">
            <next>
              <block type="maze_moveEast">
                <next>
                  <block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
                    <title name="TIMES">5</title>
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="collector_collect">
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_moveNorth"/>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                    <next>
                      <block type="maze_moveEast">
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_moveEast">
                            <next>
                              <block type="controls_repeat_simplified">
                                <title name="TIMES">5</title>
                                <statement name="DO">
                                  <block type="maze_moveSouth">
                                    <next>
                                      <block type="collector_collect"/>
                                    </next>
                                  </block>
                                </statement>
                              </block>
                            </next>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

courseB_collector_loops_challenge2a_2021.courseB_collector_loops_challenge2a_a: Agar qandaydir xatolik ketsa, uni to‘g‘rilashga urinib ko‘ring. Aslo taslim bo‘lmang!
courseB_collector_loops_challenge2a_2021.courseB_collector_loops_challenge2a_b: Labirint orqali o‘tish uchun ushbu variantni ko‘rib chiqing. Takrorlashingiz mumkin bo‘lgan o‘xshashliklarni ko‘rmoqdamisiz?
courseB_collector_loops_challenge2a_2021.courseB_collector_loops_challenge2a_c: Barcha xazinalarni to‘plash uchun o‘zingizning tsiklingiz ichiga ikkita <xml> <block type="collector_collect"/></xml> kod bo‘lagini qo‘shishingiz yoki kod bo‘laginini o‘zining `repeat` kod bo‘lagining ichiga qo‘yishingiz kerak bo‘ladi.

courseB_iceage_loops10_2021.courseB_iceage_loops10_a: Singan muzdan ehtiyot bo'ling! Skrat suvga tushib ketmasin!
courseB_iceage_loops10_2021.courseB_iceage_loops10_b: Bosqichlarni baland ovoz bilan aytishga yoki ularni qog'ozga yozishga harakat qiling. Biror  naqsh ko'rayapsizmi?
courseB_iceage_loops10_2021.courseB_iceage_loops10_c: Bu katta jumboq! Ushbu yo'ldan boring.

courseB_iceage_loops1_2021.courseB_iceage_loops1_a: Singan muzdan ehtiyot bo'ling! Skrat suvga tushib ketmasin!
courseB_iceage_loops1_2021.courseB_iceage_loops1_b:
Sizga ushbu bloklardan foydalanishingiz kerak:

<xml><block type="maze_moveEast"/></xml>

courseB_iceage_loops2_2021.courseB_iceage_loops2_a: Jumboqni ikki qismga bo'ling: biri burchakdan oldin va ikkinchisi burchakdan keyin.
courseB_iceage_loops2_2021.courseB_iceage_loops2_b: Agar qotib qolsangiz, qadamlarni baland ovoz bilan aytishga harakat qiling.
courseB_iceage_loops2_2021.courseB_iceage_loops2_c: Skratni yong'oqqa yetkazish uchun ushbu yo'ldan boring.

courseB_iceage_loops4_2021.courseB_iceage_loops4_a: Skratning yong'oqqacha qadamlarini yozib ko'ring. Biror takrorlash ko'rayapsizmi?
courseB_iceage_loops4_2021.courseB_iceage_loops4_b: Natijani ko'rish uchun kodingizni ishlatib ko'rishdan tortinmang!
courseB_iceage_loops4_2021.courseB_iceage_loops4_c: Bu Skrat bosib o'tishi kerak bo'lgan yo'l.

courseB_iceage_loops6_2021.courseB_iceage_loops6_a: Sizning yakuniy kodingizda **uchta** harakat bloki bo'lishi kerak.

courseB_iceage_loops7_2021.courseB_iceage_loops7_a: Agar qotib qolsangiz, qadamlarni qog'ozga yozib ko'ring. Biror naqsh ko'rayapsizmi?
courseB_iceage_loops7_2021.courseB_iceage_loops7_b: Bu Skrat yong'oqqa yetishi uchun bosib o'tadigan yo'l.

courseB_iceage_loops8_2021.courseB_iceage_loops8_a: Harakat bloklari to'g'rimi? Yana nimani o'zgartira olasiz?
courseB_iceage_loops8_2021.courseB_iceage_loops8_b: Birinchi sikl **3** marta, ikkinchisi **5** marta, uchinchisi **4** marta va oxirgisi **4** marta bajarilishi kerak.
courseB_iceage_loops8_2021.courseB_iceage_loops8_c: Skratga ushbu yo'lni bosib o'tishda yordam berish uchun sikllardan foydalaning.

courseB_iceage_loops9_2021.courseB_iceage_loops9_a: Muammo bormi? Ushbu jumboqni kichikroq qismlarga ajratib ko'ring. Kod yozish jarayonida jumboqni ishga tushirishdan  qo'rqmang!
courseB_iceage_loops9_2021.courseB_iceage_loops9_b: Sizning yakuniy kodingizda **4** ta sikl bloki bo'lishi kerak.
courseB_iceage_loops9_2021.courseB_iceage_loops9_c: Yong'oqni olish uchun Skrat bu yo'ldan borishi kerak.

courseB_maze_seq1_2021.courseB_maze_seq1_a: Skratni harakatga keltirish uchun bloklarni <xml><block type="when_run"/></xml> blokiga ulang!
courseB_maze_seq1_2021.courseB_maze_seq1_b: Skratni yong'oqqa yetkazish uchun <xml><block type="maze_moveSouth"/></xml> o'qlardan uchtasini torting va <xml><block type="when_run"/></xml> blokiga ulang.

courseB_maze_seq4_2021.courseB_maze_seq4_a: Yong'oqqa yetib borguncha bittadan ko'rsatma qo'shib ko'ring.
courseB_maze_seq4_2021.courseB_maze_seq4_b: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun <xml><block type="maze_moveEast"/></xml> blokidan foydalanishni xohlaysiz.

courseB_maze_seq5_2021.courseB_maze_seq5_a: Agar to‘xtab qolsangiz, qadamlarni qog’ozga yozib ko‘ring.
courseB_maze_seq5_2021.courseB_maze_seq5_b: Bu jumboqni yechishning ikki xil usuli bor!
courseB_maze_seq5_2021.courseB_maze_seq5_c: Eman yong'og'iga qanday borishni bilmayapsizmi? Ushbu yo'lni sinab ko'ring.

courseB_maze_seq6_2021.courseB_maze_seq6_a: Sizning yakuniy kodingizda uchta harakat bloki bo'lishi kerak.
courseB_maze_seq6_2021.courseB_maze_seq6_b: Agar o'ylanib qolsangiz, jumboqni ikki qismga bo'lib yechib ko'ring, biri yon tomonga, ikkinchisi yuqoriga va pastga.
courseB_maze_seq6_2021.courseB_maze_seq5_c: Bu jumboqni yechishning ikki xil usuli bor!
courseB_maze_seq6_2021.courseB_maze_seq5_d: Eman yong'og'iga qanday borishni bilmayapsizmi? Ushbu yo'lni sinab ko'ring!

courseB_maze_seq7_2021.courseB_maze_seq7_a: Skratni yong'oq taraf yurdirish uchun 1 ta blok qo'shing.
courseB_maze_seq7_2021.courseB_maze_seq7_b: Sizga berilgan kodni ishlatib ko'ring va qayerda borishingizni ko'ring.
courseB_maze_seq7_2021.courseB_maze_seq7_c: Yong'oqqa yetolmayapsizmi? Ushbu yo'lni sinab ko'ring!

courseB_maze_seq8_2021.courseB_maze_seq8_a: Jumboqni yechmaguningizcha birma-bir blok qo'shib ko'ring.
courseB_maze_seq8_2021.courseB_maze_seq8_b: Bu jumboqni yechish usullari bittadan ko'p!
courseB_maze_seq8_2021.courseB_maze_seq8_c: Qayga yurishni bilmayapsizmi? Ushbu yo'lni sinab ko'ring!

courseB_maze_seq9_2021.courseB_maze_seq9_a: Avval barcha qadamlarni qog'ozga yozib ko'ring.
courseB_maze_seq9_2021.courseB_maze_seq9_b: Dasturingizni bir vaqtda bitta blok qo'shib, sinab borib yarating.
courseB_maze_seq9_2021.courseB_maze_seq9_c: Bu jumboqni yechishning ikki xil usuli bor!
courseB_maze_seq9_2021.courseB_maze_seq9_d: Qotib qoldingizmi? Ushbu yo'lni sinab ko'ring!

courseB_maze_seq_challenge1_2021.courseB_maze_seq_challenge1_a: Bu safar eng qisqa yo'l ishlamasligi mumkin.
courseB_maze_seq_challenge1_2021.courseB_maze_seq_challenge1_b: Boshlash uchun <xml><block type="maze_moveWest"/></xml> blokidan foydalanib ko'ring.

courseB_maze_seq_challenge2_2021.courseB_maze_seq_challenge2_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun blok qo'shish yoki olib tashlashning hojati yo'q.
courseB_maze_seq_challenge2_2021.courseB_maze_seq_challenge2_b: Bloklarni qayta joylashtiring va zinapoya kabi yo'ldan o'ting.

courseB_playlab_events2_2021.courseB_playlab_events2_a:
Bu Daisy biron narsani aytishi uchun blok:

<xml>
  <block type="studio_saySpriteChoices">
    <title name="SPRITE">0</title>
    <title name="VALUE">Hi there.</title>
  </block>
  </xml>

courseB_playlab_events3_2021.courseB_playlab_events3_a:
Hodisani qo'shish uchun foydalanishingiz kerak bo'lgan blok:

<xml>
<block type="studio_whenSpriteClicked">
    <title name="SPRITE">0</title>
  </block>
  </xml>
courseB_playlab_events3_2021.courseB_playlab_events3_b:
Daisy kayfiyatini o'zgartirish uchun kerak bo'lgan blok:

<xml>
<block type="studio_setSpriteEmotion">
    <title name="SPRITE">0</title>
    <title name="VALUE">random</title>
  </block>
  </xml>

courseB_playlab_events4_2021.courseB_playlab_events4_a:
Bu chap o'qni boshqaradigan hodisa:

<xml>
  <block type="studio_whenArrow">
    <title name="VALUE">left</title>
  </block>
  </xml>
courseB_playlab_events4_2021.courseB_playlab_events4_b:
Bu ritsarni chapga siljitadigan blok.

<xml>
<block type="studio_move">
    <title name="SPRITE">1</title>
    <title name="DIR">8</title>
  </block>
  </xml>

courseB_playlab_events5_2021.courseB_playlab_events5_a:
Bu o'ng o'qni boshqaradigan hodisalar bloki:

<xml>
  <block type="studio_whenArrow">
    <title name="VALUE">right</title>
  </block>
  </xml>
courseB_playlab_events5_2021.courseB_playlab_events5_b:
Bu ritsarni qochib ketishiga olib keladigan blok.

<xml>
<block type="studio_move">
    <title name="SPRITE">1</title>
    <title name="DIR">2</title>
  </block>
</xml>

courseB_playlab_events6_2021.courseB_playlab_events6_a:
Sizga ushbu hodisa bloklari kerak bo'ladi:

<xml>
  <block type="studio_whenArrow" id="callMe">
    <title name="VALUE">up</title>
  </block>
  <block type="studio_whenArrow" id="callMe">

courseC_PlayLab_events7_2021.courseC_PlayLab_events7_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun `repeat forever` sikli ichidagi `move actor 2 up 400 pixels` va `move actor 2 down 400 pixels` bloklaridan foydalaning.
courseC_PlayLab_events7_2021.courseC_PlayLab_events7_b: `repeat forever` sikli boshqa hodisalar bloklari bilan bog’lanishi shart emas; u o‘zi mustaqil ishlaydi.

courseC_PlayLab_events8_2021.courseC_PlayLab_events8_a: Buni to‘g’ri bajarish uchun bloklarni `when actor touches` blokiga birlashtirishingiz kerak bo‘ladi.

courseC_PlayLab_events9_2021.courseC_PlayLab_events9_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun `score point` blogi sizga yordam beradi.
courseC_PlayLab_events9_2021.courseC_PlayLab_events9_b: Sizning yangi `when actor touches` blokingizga aktyor **1** va aktyor **3** deb yozilganligiga ishonch hosil qiling.
courseC_PlayLab_events9_2021.courseC_PlayLab_events9_c: Sizning ish joyingizda bir vaqtning o‘zida `when actor touches` hodisasi bir nechta bo‘lishi mumkin, shuning uchun birinchisini o‘chirishingiz shart emas!

courseC_PlayLab_eventsA_2021.courseC_PlayLab_eventsA_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun `set background` blokidan va `set actor to a ____ speed` blokidan foydalaning.
courseC_PlayLab_eventsA_2021.courseC_PlayLab_eventsA_b: Ushbu jumboqni hal qilish uchun siz `when run` hodisalar blokini maxsus ravishda ish joyiga olib borishingiz kerak bo‘ladi.

courseC_PlayLab_eventsFP_2021.idea3:
_G’oya kerakmi?_

**Pinball** - Bitta personajni strelka tugmalari bilan harakatlantiring (`when up arrow`, `when down arrow` bloklaridan foydalaning) so‘ngra ekrandagi boshqa belgilar bilan to‘qnashganda tasodifiy tovushlarni ijro ettiring.
courseC_PlayLab_eventsFP_2021.idea1: _G'oya kerakmi?_ **Kim bor u yerda?** Qahramonlarni tasodifiy ko'rinishga ega qiling, shunda hech kim keyin nima chiqishini bilmaydi.
courseC_PlayLab_eventsFP_2021.idea2: _G'oya kerakmi?_ \*\* Sarguzashtlarga borish \*\* - Fonni o'zgartiring, keyin qahramonlar hozir qayerda ekanliklari haqida gapirib beradigan qiling.

courseC_harvester_loops3_2021.courseC_harvester_loops3_a: Xato qilishdan qo‘rqmang! Hali ham boshqotirmani hal qilmagan bo‘lsangiz ham, nima bo‘lishini ko‘rish uchun bo‘laklarni qo‘shib kodni ishlatib ko‘ring.

courseC_harvester_loops3_2021.courseC_harvester_loops3_c: Agar siz kodingizni soddalashtirmoqchi bo‘lsangiz, bitta siklni ikkinchisining ichiga qo‘yishingiz mumkin! Bu **nested loop** (ichki sikl) deb ataladi.

courseC_harvester_loops4_2021.courseC_harvester_loops4_a: Makkajo‘xori yig’ish uchun yangi `pick corn`(makkajo‘xori yig’ish) blokidan foydalaning.

courseC_harvester_loops4_2021.courseC_harvester_loops4_c: Agar siz kodingizni soddalashtirmoqchi bo‘lsangiz, bitta siklni ikkinchisining ichiga qo‘yishingiz mumkin! Bu **nested loop** (ichki sikl) deb ataladi.

courseC_harvester_loops6_2021.courseC_harvester_loops6_a: Shuni esda tutingki, bitta takroriy siklga bir nechta bloklarni qo‘yishingiz mumkin.

courseC_harvester_loops7_2021.courseC_harvester_loops7_b: Ushbu jumboqni hal qilish uchun sizga bir nechta `repeat` sikli kerak bo‘ladi.

courseC_harvester_loops8_2021.courseC_harvester_loops8_a: Ushbu bosqich boshqa jumboqlarga o‘xshash ko‘rinayaptimi? Harakatlar o‘xshash bo‘lishi kerak, faqat yo‘l davomida hosil yig’ishni unutmang.

courseC_harvester_loops_challenge1a_2021.courseC_harvester_loops_challenge1_c:
Makkajo‘xorini markazda yig’ishning eng yaxshi usuli  `repeat` bloki ichida boshqa `repeat` blokdan foydalanish.

<xml><block type="controls_repeat">

              <block type="maze_turn">

              </block>

courseC_maze_programming_challenge2_2021.courseC_maze_programming_challenge2_b:

courseD_artist_nestedLoops1_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1_c: Bosqichlarni qog'ozga yozib, tsikllar yordamida soddalashtiriladigan namunalarni qidirib ko'ring.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_a:
Jami 6 ta uchburchak chizishingiz kerak bo'ladi. Har bir uchburchakni tugatgandan so'ng, 60 daraja aylantiring va keyingi uchburchakni boshlash uchun harakat qiling.

![](https://images.code.org/ad6c6d98298df9f4e3cea5bbe5ec776e-image-1497476332024.2_solution2.gif)
courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_b: Agar siz uchburchakni tsikl bilan yaratadigan bo'lsangiz, rassom ular boshlagan yo'l bilan qaragan bo'lishi kerak. Bu 60 daraja burilishni ancha osonlashtiradi.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops1a_c: Agar siz ranglarni xohlasangiz, kodingizdagi "set color" blokidan foydalaning. Shablon rasmidagi ranglarga mos kelishingiz shart emas.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops2_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops2_a: O'zingizning uchburchak kodingizdagi tsikllarni  boshqa "repeat" tsikli bilan o'rang.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops2_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops2_b: Rassom har uchburchakdan keyin aylanishi uchun tsiklning ichiga "burilish" blokini qo'yishni unutmang.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_a:
Bir kvadrat tepasidan keyingisini boshlaydigan joyga yetib borish uchun "oldinga sakrash" blokidan foydalanib ko'ring. 

 Agar sizning kvadratchalaringiz balandligi 20 piksel bo'lsa va ular bir-biridan 20 piksel bo'lsa, sizga qancha sakrash kerak?
courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_b: Ushbu jumboqni tezda hal qilish uchun ichki tsikldan foydalanishni unutmang.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops3_c: Bir kvadrat hosil qilish uchun "repeat" tsikli yordamida boshlang. Keyin, ushbu kvadratni 8 marta takrorlang va orasiga 40 piksel sakrab chiqing.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_d: Buni to'g'ri hal qilish uchun siz \*\* burilishdan oldin \*\* harakat qilishingiz kerak, aks holda sizning doiralaringiz eng kichik miqdorda noto'g'ri bo'ladi!
courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_a:

-   360 marta takrorlang 
-   1 piksel oldinga siljiting 
-   chapga 1 daraja buriling
courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_b: Doiralar  orasidagi 50 pikselga oldinga sakrashni unutmang.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops4_c: O'zingizning doiralaringizni 4 marta chizish uchun ichki tsikldan foydalaning.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops5_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops5_a:

-   4 marta takrorlang 
-   aylana yasang 
-   50 piksel oldinga sakrang 
-   90 daraja o'ngga buriling
courseD_artist_nestedLoops5_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops5_b: Doira yasash uchun 360 marta takrorlash uchun takroriy tsikl o'rnatishingiz kerak bo'ladi. Ichida 1 piksel oldinga siljiting va 1 daraja buriling.

courseD_artist_nestedLoops7_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops7_a: Bu yerda ichki tsikldan foydalanishingiz kerak. Birinchidan, kvadrat chizish uchun tsikldan foydalaning. Ichki tsikl kvadrat chizsa, tashqi tsikl nima qiladi?
courseD_artist_nestedLoops7_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops7_b:
Ichki tsikl kvadrat uchun kod bo'lgan ichki o'rnatilgan tsikldan foydalaning. 

-   6 marta takrorlang 
-   kvadrat hosil qiling 
-   \*\* 50 pikselga oldinga sakrang \*\* 
-   \*\* 60 darajaga buriling \*\*

courseD_artist_nestedLoops8_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops8_a: Chizilgan rasmingizda 8 olti burchakli bo'lishi uchun ularning har biri o'rtasida \*\* 45 daraja \*\* burilish kerak. Nima uchun? Chunki 360 daraja (to'liq burilish) 8 ga bo'lingan (olti burchakli son) 45 daraja.
courseD_artist_nestedLoops8_2021.courseD_artist_nestedLoops8_b: Agar siz qiynalib qolsangiz, avvalgi jumboqni ko'rib chiqing, so'ngra boshqacha narsalarni o'zgartiring.

-   Agar tashqi siklni 6 marta takrorlasangiz, 60 darajaga burib ko‘ring.

courseD_bee_conditionals4_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals4_b: Har bir bo‘sh joyni nektar uchun tekshirish uchun siklingiz ichidagi `if` ifodasidan foydalaning.

courseD_bee_conditionals4_dani.courseD_bee_conditionals4_hintVid1: Boshlashda yordam kerakmi? Videoni tomosha qiling!
courseD_bee_conditionals4_dani.courseD_bee_conditionals4_a: Hali ham har qanday bo‘shliqqa xuddi bulut bor kabi muomala qilishingiz mumkin, garchi butun yo‘lni ko‘rsangiz ham.
courseD_bee_conditionals4_dani.courseD_bee_conditionals4_b: Har bir bo‘sh joyni nektar uchun tekshirish uchun siklingiz ichidagi `if` ifodasidan foydalaning.
courseD_bee_conditionals4_dani.courseD_bee_conditionals4_c: <xml><block type="maze_untilBlocked"/></xml>  blokidan foydalanib, oldinga siljish va gul borligini tekshirish kerak. Agar gul bo'lsa, asalari nima qilishi kerak?
courseD_bee_conditionals4_dani.courseD_bee_conditionals4_hintVid2: Ushbu jumboqni yechishda yordam olish uchun ushbu videoni tomosha qiling.

courseD_bee_conditionals5_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals5_a: Agar siz "if at flower\`" blokidan foydalansangiz, buni ichma-ich sikl yordamida yechishingiz mumkin. Chap va pastki yo'llar uchun dastur yozing, so'ngra hammasini ikki marta takrorlang!
courseD_bee_conditionals5_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals5_c: Yo'ldan yurish uchun ari `move forward` - "oldinga siljishi" kerak. U harakati davomida, gulni tekshirishi kerak. "Agar gul bo'lsa", asalari `get nectar` - "nektar olishi" kerak.

courseD_bee_conditionals5_dani.courseD_bee_conditionals5_hintVid1: Boshlashda yordam kerakmi? Videoni tomosha qiling!
courseD_bee_conditionals5_dani.courseD_bee_conditionals5_a: To'rtburchaklar yo'lning har tomonini o'z-o'zidan yo'l deb o'ylang. Ichkarida "repeat" bloki va ichki qismida "while there is a path ahead" tsiklini o'rnating. Agar asalarilar har tomondan gulga borishi  kerak bo'lsa, asalarilarning qancha yo'llar bilan borishi kerak?
courseD_bee_conditionals5_dani.courseD_bee_conditionals5_c: To'rtburchakning 3 tomoni gulli, shuning uchun kodni "3 marta takrorlash" kerak. Har bir takrorlashda, ari yo'lni davom ettirishga to'g'ri keladi,agar  "oldinda esa yo'l bor" bo'lsa. Yo'lda davom etish uchun ari "oldinga siljish" kerak bo'ladi. Yo'lda ketayotganda, ari gulni tekshirishi kerak. agar gul bo'lsa, asalari "nektar olishi" kerak.
courseD_bee_conditionals5_dani.courseD_bee_conditionals5_b: "while there is a path ahead" bloki ichida oldinga siljish va gulni tekshirish kerak bo'ladi. Gul borligini qanday tekshirish mumkin? Agar gul bo'lsa nima qilasiz?
courseD_bee_conditionals5_dani.courseD_bee_conditionals5_hintVid2: Ushbu jumboqni yechishda yordam olish uchun ushbu videoni tomosha qiling.

courseD_bee_conditionals6_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals6_a: Har bir bulut ostida asalari ini mavjudligini tekshirish uchun "if" iborasidan foydalanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling.
courseD_bee_conditionals6_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals6_b: Bunday holda, bulutlar ostida gullarni tekshirishning hojati yo'q.
courseD_bee_conditionals6_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals6_c: Kodingizni soddalashtirish uchun foydalanishingiz mumkin bo'lgan tsikl bormi?

courseD_bee_conditionals7_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals7_a:
\*\* Esingizda bo'lsin: \*\* Ushbu jumboq har safar ishlatilganda o'zgarib turadi.  

Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli blokdan foydalanishni xohlaysiz ("if / else").
courseD_bee_conditionals7_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals7_b: Agar bulut ostida gul bo'lmasa, unda asalari ini bo'lishi kerak, shuning uchun bo'sh joy haqida o'ylashning hojati yo'q.

courseD_bee_conditionals7_predict2_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals7_a:
\*\* Esingizda bo'lsin: \*\* Ushbu jumboq har safar ishlatilganda o'zgarib turadi.  

Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli blokdan foydalanishni xohlaysiz ("if / else").

courseD_bee_conditionals8_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals8_a: \*\* Esingizda bo‘lsin: \*\* Ushbu boshqotirma har safar ishlatilganda o‘zgarib turadi. Muammoni hal qilish uchun siz shartli bo‘lakdan foydalanishingiz kerak (`if` yoki `if/else`).
courseD_bee_conditionals8_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals8_b:
Ushbu boshqotirma juda chalg‘itadigan turidan, chunki bitta shartli ifoda bilan bo‘sh kvadratlar, nektar va asalni mavjudligini tekshirib bo‘lmaydi.

  Faqat yo‘lingiz oxirida nektar va asal mavjudligini tekshiring.

courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_a: Hech bir daraxtga urmasdan har bir gul va asalga yetadigan yo'lni topa olasizmi? Eng yaxshi yo'l spiraldir.
courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_b: Ushbu jumboqda har bir bo'shliqda gul, asalari ini yoki hech narsa bo'lishi mumkin. Demak, har bir kvadrat bo'yicha siz "if / else" shartini takrorlashingiz mumkin.

courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge2_2021.courseD_bee_conditionals_challenge1_b:
Xuddi "if at flower" bloklari singari,"while nectar> 0 " ichidagi kod faqat ari gulda bo'lganida ishlaydi. Farqi shundaki, ichkaridagi kod nektar qolmaguncha qayta-qayta ishlaydi. Ushbu namunani sinab ko'ring:

<xml>  <block type="bee_whileNectarAmount">
    <title name="ARG1">nectarRemaining</title>
    <title name="OP">></title>
    <title name="ARG2">0</title>                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_nectar"/>
                    </statement>
  </block></xml>

courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_a: Ishlamayaptimi? Kodni qatorma qator ishga tushirish uchun "Step" tugmachasidan foydalaning.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_b: Birinchi to‘rtburchakning bir tomoniga kod yozib ko‘ring. Hamma nektarni yig‘ib olish uchun sikldan foydalana olasizmi?
courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_c: Gul bilan to‘rtburchakga yetib kelganingizda `get nectar` kod bo‘lagini ishlatishni unutmang.

courseD_bee_nestedLoops1a_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_a: Ishlamayaptimi? Kodni qatorma qator ishga tushirish uchun "Step" tugmachasidan foydalaning.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops1a_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops1_c: Gul bilan to‘rtburchakga yetib kelganingizda `get nectar` kod bo‘lagini ishlatishni unutmang.

courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_a: Ushbu boshqotirmani yechish uchun, bitta `repeat` siklini boshqa tskikl ichiga joylashtirishingiz kerak.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_b: Sikllarni qayerga joylashni bilmayapsizmi? Kodni bitta ketma ketlikda qog‘ozga yozib ko‘ring va o‘xshashliklarni qidirib ko‘ring.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops2_c: Sikl ichiga birdan ko‘p bo‘lak joylashtirishingiz mumkinligini unutmang.

courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_a: `get nectar` buyrug‘ini boshqa `repeat` kod bo‘lagi ichida qayta ishlatishingizga to‘g‘ri keladi. Bundan tashqari ushbu `repeat` kod bo‘lagi ichida `move forward` bo‘lagi ham mavjud bo‘ladi.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_b: Bu boshqotirmani yechimini topishingiz uchun berilgan 3 ta `repeat` bo‘laklarini barchasini ishlatishingiz kerak bo‘ladi.
courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_2021.courseD_bee_nestedLoops7_c:
Bo‘laklaringizni 3 karra ichkariga joylashtiring, mana bu tarzda:

-   repeat 4
    -   repeat 3
        -   repeat 12
            -   get nectar
        -   move forward
    -   turn right

courseD_bounce_events10s_2021.courseD_bounce_events10s_a:
Kodda ushbu hodisalarning ikkalasi ham bo'lishi kerak:

<xml><block type="bounce_whenBallInGoal" deletable="false"><next><block type="bounce_playSound"><title name="SOUND">swish</title><next><block type="bounce_incrementPlayerScore"></block></next></block></next></block><block type="bounce_whenBallMissesPaddle" deletable="false"><next><block type="bounce_playSound"><title name="SOUND">whistle</title><next><block type="bounce_incrementOpponentScore"></block></next></block></next></block></xml>

courseD_bounce_events11s_2021.courseD_bounce_events11s_a: O'yin boshlanganda, savatni urganingizda va qo'l to'pga tegmaganda sizga to'p tashlash kerak bo'ladi.

courseD_bounce_events12s_2021.courseD_bounce_events12s_a: Ushbu bloklarni "ishga tushirilganda" hodisasiga qo'shib, basketbol to'pi yoki qo'l tezligini oshirishingiz mumkin.
courseD_bounce_events12s_2021.courseD_bounce_events12s_b: Har bir zarbani 2 ballik qilib, jamoa logotipini mahalliy jamoanikiga o'zgartiring!

courseD_bounce_events1s_2021.courseD_bounce_events1s_a:
Ushbu o'yin ishlashi uchun "chapga siljish" blokini "chap o'q bo'lganda" hodisasiga qo'shishingiz kerak:

 <xml> <block type="bounce_whenLeft" deletable="false" x="20" y="20">
    <next>
      <block type="bounce_moveLeft"/>
    </next>
  </block>

   </xml>
courseD_bounce_events1s_2021.courseD_bounce_events1s_b: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun "Ishga tushirish" tugmachasini bosib, qo'lni savatga olib borishni unutmang.

courseD_bounce_events2s_2021.courseD_bounce_events2s_a:
Bu ishlashi uchun ikkita "move" hodisasi uchun kod bo'lishi kerak:

<xml>
  <block type="bounce_whenLeft" deletable="false" x="20" y="20">
    <next>
      <block type="bounce_moveLeft"/>
    </next>
  </block>
  <block type="bounce_whenRight" deletable="false" x="180" y="20">
    <next>
      <block type="bounce_moveRight"/>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

courseD_bounce_events5s_2021.courseD_bounce_events5s_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun qo'lni harakat qilish kerak emas.
courseD_bounce_events5s_2021.courseD_bounce_events5s_b:
Ushbu kodni ish maydoniga qo'shganingizga ishonch hosil qiling:

<xml>  <block type="bounce_whenPaddleCollided" deletable="false"> <next> <block type="bounce_bounceBall"/></next></block></xml>

courseD_bounce_events6s_2021.courseD_bounce_events6s_a:
Sizda shunga o'xshash hodisa bormi?

<xml><block type="bounce_whenWallCollided" deletable="false"><next><block type="bounce_bounceBall"></block></next></block></block></xml>
courseD_bounce_events6s_2021.courseD_bounce_events6s_b: Agar siz kodni to'g'ri yozgan bo'lsangiz, g'olib bo'lish uchun qo'lni harakatlantirish shart emas.

courseD_bounce_events7s_2021.courseD_bounce_events7s_a: Agar xohlasangiz, ko'proq joylarda tovushlarni qo'shishingiz mumkin!

courseD_collector_debugging1a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging1_a:
Birinchi qadamda hammasi to'g'ri yoki yo'qligini bilish uchun "Qadam " tugmachasidan foydalaning. 

 Ikkinchisi-chi? 

 Qayerda xato yuz berdi?
courseD_collector_debugging1a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging1_c: Xazinani ko'chib o'tgandan so'ng uni yig'ish uchun "yig'ish" blokidan foydalanishni unutmang.

courseD_collector_debugging2a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging2a_a:
Birinchi qadamda hammasi to'g'ri yoki yo'qligini bilish uchun "Qadam " tugmachasidan foydalaning. 

 Ikkinchisi-chi? 

 Qayerda xato yuz berdi?
courseD_collector_debugging2a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging2a_c:
Nima bo'ldi?

Nima bo'lishi kerak edi?

Bu sizga nima deydi?

courseD_collector_debugging3a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging3_a: Laurel mantiqsiz ish qiladigan joy bormi? Ushbu bloklarni o'zgartirganda nima bo'ladi?

courseD_collector_debugging4a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging4_a:
Nosozliklarni tuzatish jarayonini ketma-ket ikki marta ishlatib ko'ring. 

 Birinchi muammoning sababi nima? 

 Ushbu muammo bartaraf etilgandan so'ng, nima bo'ladi?
courseD_collector_debugging4a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging4_b:
Agar zinapoyadan qadam chizig'ini qanday qilishni bilmasdan  qiynalayotgan bo'lsangiz, uni barmoq bilan kuzatib, buyruqlarni baland ovoz bilan aytishga harakat qiling. 

 Burilishlar yo'nalishini ko'rsatishni unutmang!

courseD_collector_debugging5a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging5a_a:
Kod nima qildi?

Nima qilish kerak edi?

Bu sizga nima deydi?
courseD_collector_debugging5a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging5a_b: Xazinaning birinchi qatorini to'plaganingizdan so'ng, sizning kodingizda nima qoladi?

courseD_collector_debugging6a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging6_a:
"Qadam " tugmasi yordamida kod orqali harakat qilib ko'ring. Birinchi bosqichda hamma narsa yaxshi bo'ladimi? 

Qanday ikkinchisi? 

Qayerda ishlar noto'g'ri ketmoqda?
courseD_collector_debugging6a_2021.courseD_collector_debugging6_b: Sizga kerak bo'lgan barcha bloklar ish maydonida. Agar narsalar juda chalkashib ketsa, "start over" - "qayta boshlash" tugmasini bosib ko'ring.

courseD_collector_nested_loops_challenge.courseD_bee_nested_loops_challenge2_a: Bitta buyruqni yoki uzunroq buyruqlarni `takrorlash`ingiz mumkinligini unutmang. Hatto `takrorlash` kod bo‘lagini boshqa `takrorlash` kod bo‘lagini bilan takrorlashingiz mumkin!
courseD_collector_nested_loops_challenge.courseD_bee_nested_loops_challenge2_b: Barcha 4 olmoslarni qo‘lga kiritish uchun avval markazdan uzoqlashish uchun sikldan foydalaning. Chapga yoki o‘ngga buriling, so‘ng xazinaning birinchi uyumidan ikkinchisiga o‘tish uchun ichki sikldan foydalaning. Agar ichki siklni yetarlicha takrorlasangiz, terimchi _butun_ g‘or atrofida harakat qiladi!
courseD_collector_nested_loops_challenge.courseD_bee_nested_loops_challenge2_c: Xazinaga yetib boradigan eng qisqa dastur faqat bitta `collect` kod bo‘lagidan va ikkita burilishdan foydalanadi.
courseD_collector_nested_loops_challenge.courseD_bee_nested_loops_challenge2_d:
**Yechim:**

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="controls_repeat_dropdown">
        <title name="TIMES" config="3-10">3</title>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="maze_move">
            <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <next>
          <block type="maze_turn">
            <title name="DIR">turnLeft</title>
            <next>
              <block type="controls_repeat_dropdown">
                <title name="TIMES" config="3-10">3</title>
                <statement name="DO">
                  <block type="collector_collect">
                    <next>
                      <block type="controls_repeat_dropdown">
                        <title name="TIMES" config="3-10">3</title>
                        <statement name="DO">
                          <block type="maze_move">
                            <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                          </block>
                        </statement>
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_turn">
                            <title name="DIR">turnLeft</title>
                            <next>
                              <block type="controls_repeat_dropdown">
                                <title name="TIMES" config="3-10">3</title>
                                <statement name="DO">
                                  <block type="maze_move">
                                    <title name="DIR">moveForward</title>
                                  </block>
                                </statement>
                              </block>
                            </next>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </statement>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

courseD_farmer_condLoops1_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops1_a: Takrorlash siklini ishlatgan holda makajo‘horini 5 marta qidirishingiz kerak bo‘ladi.
courseD_farmer_condLoops1_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops1_b: `if at corn` kod bo‘lagini ishlating aks holda qatorda mavjud bo‘lmagan narsani terib olishingiz mumkin!

courseD_farmer_condLoops2_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops2_a: Buni amalga oshirishni eng yaxshi yo‘li `if` ifodalarini bir birini ichida ishlatishdan iborat.
courseD_farmer_condLoops2_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops2_b: Ushbu boshqotirmada, siz bitta `if/else` va bitta `if` ifodalarini ishlatishingiz kerak.
courseD_farmer_condLoops2_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops2_c:
Sizning `if` ifodangiz ushbu ko‘rinishda bo‘lishi mumkin:

-   Agarda makkajo‘xori bo‘lsa
    -   makkajo‘xorini terib oling
-   aks holda
    -   karam bo‘lsa
        -   karamni terib oling

Agarda hech narsa yoq bo‘lsa, hech narsa terib olmaysiz!

courseD_farmer_condLoops3_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops3_a:
Barcha ekinlarni yig‘ib olishingiz uchun, `if` ifodalarini 3 marta birini ichiga joylashtirib ko‘ring.

Buni ma‘nosi, siz `if` ifodasini boshqa `if` ifodasini ichiga, va so‘ngra uchinchi `if` ifodasini ikkinchi `if` ifodasini ichiga joylashtirishingiz kerak.
courseD_farmer_condLoops3_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops3_b: Ushbu boshqotirmada, siz bitta `if/else` va bitta `if` ifodalarini ishlatishingiz kerak.

courseD_farmer_condLoops4_2021.grade3_RunningFarm_4courseD_farmer_condL:
Har bir novdadan nechta karam boshi o‘sib chiqishini hech kim bilmaydi.

`while there is lettuce` kod bo‘lagini ishlatgan holda, har bir ekin yi‘gib olinishi uchun sikldan foydalaning.
`while` sikli bosh joylar bilan ham ishlayveradi! Hech qanday kamar bo‘lmaganligi sababli, hechnima terilmaydi va kod keyingi qatordan davom etadi.
`while path ahead` siklini yoki `repeat` siklini ishlatgan holda, barcha ekinlarni sikl bilan ko‘rib chiqishingiz mumkin.

courseD_farmer_condLoops5_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops5_a: `repeat until at pumpkin` nomli yangi sikl mavjud. Bu siklni boshqotirmada qanday ishlatishni bilasizmi?
courseD_farmer_condLoops5_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops5_b: Har bir joyda bir nechta makkajo‘xori yoki karam o‘simligi bo‘lishi mumkin. Barchasini yig‘ish uchun `while` siklidan foydalaning!

courseD_farmer_condLoops6_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops6_a: Fermerni spiralning har bir bo'lagi bo'ylab pastga siljitish uchun `while path ahead` - "oldinda yo'l bo'lguncha" siklidan yoki `if path ahead / else` - "agar oldinda yo'l bo'lsa / aks holda" blokidan foydalaning.
courseD_farmer_condLoops6_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops6_b: Hosil yig'ishning ko'p qismida siz faqat makkajo'xori borligini tekshirishingiz kerak. Faqat dasturingizning oxirida bitta qovoq oling.

courseD_farmer_condLoops7_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops7_a:
E‘tibor bering, barcha ekinlarni yig‘ib olishning eng oson yo‘li hali ham spiraldir.

![](https://images.code.org/ba8b8c624f21ade9ac823b045085c435-image-1479364378437.png)
courseD_farmer_condLoops7_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops7_b: Terimchini to‘g‘ri sonda qadam bosgan holda harakatlanishi uchun `when path ahead` - "oldinda yo'l bo'lguncha" blokidan foydalanib ko‘ring.

courseD_farmer_condLoops_challenge1_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops_challenge1_a: Ushbu qadamda "Step" tugmasi juda foydali bo‘lishi mumkin.
courseD_farmer_condLoops_challenge1_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops_challenge1_b: Odatda siz qovoq yonida bo‘lsangiz, shunchaki "qovoq terasiz". Agar siz qovoqdasiz bo‘lsa, yana nima qilishingiz kerak?

courseD_farmer_condLoops_challenge2_2021.courseD_farmer_condLoops_challenge2_a: Har bir bo‘shliqdagi har bir sabzavot miqdori o‘zgarishi mumkin. A `while` sikli yordam berishi mumkin!

courseD_farmer_while1_2021.courseD_farmer_while1_a: Uyimga yetib borish uchun to‘rt marta oldinga yurishingiz kerak. Buning uchun `repeat` siklidan foydalanishingiz mumkinmi?
courseD_farmer_while1_2021.courseD_farmer_while1_b: Loy uyumi ustida turganingizda, uni olib tashlash uchun `remove 1` bo‘lagini ishlating.

courseD_farmer_while2_2021.courseD_farmer_while2_a: Teshikka yetib borish uchun faqat bir marta harakat qilish kerak bo‘ladi.
courseD_farmer_while2_2021.courseD_farmer_while2_b: Sizga "fill 1" bo‘lagi olti marta kerak bo‘ladi. Buni soddalashtirish uchun sikldan foydalanishingiz mumkinmi?

courseD_farmer_while3_2021.courseD_farmer_while3_a: Sikl kodingizni soddalashtirishga yordam berishi mumkin.
courseD_farmer_while3_2021.courseD_farmer_while3_b: Loy uyumiga yetib borish uchun `turn` bo‘lagi kerak bo‘lmaydi.

courseD_farmer_while4_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals4_a: `repeat` siklidan foydalanish o‘rniga, loy uyumi tugamaguncha qazishni davom ettirish uchun `while` siklidan foydalaning.
courseD_farmer_while4_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals4_b: Bu avvalgi boshqotirmaga juda o‘xshaydi, bitta farqi qaysi sikldan foydalanishingizda.

courseD_farmer_while5_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals5a_b: Qatorning oxiriga yetib borish uchun fermer jami besh marta oldinga harakatlanishi kerak. Bundan tashqari fermer yana nima qilish kerak?
courseD_farmer_while5_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals5a_c: 5 marta oldinga harakatlantiring. Har safar oldinga harakatlanganingizda, `while there is a pile` bo‘lagini ishlatib, uyumni tozalang.

courseD_farmer_while6_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals6_a: Har bir teshikni necha marta to‘ldirishni aniqlash uchun `while` siklidan foydalanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling.
courseD_farmer_while6_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals6_b: E‘tibor bering, fermer zinapoyada bir necha marta oldinga va pastga harakatlanishi kerak.
courseD_farmer_while6_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals6_c:
Narvon zinapoyasi quyidagi bo‘laklardan foydalanadi

-   move forward
-   fill hole
-   turn right
-   move forward
-   fill hole
-   turn left

Ushbu zinapoya qadam o‘xshash takrorlanishni necha marta ishlatishingizga to‘g‘ri keladi? Teshikni to‘ldirish uchun `while there is a hole` bo‘lagini ishlatayotganingizga ishonch hosil qiling.

courseD_farmer_while7_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_a: `while path ahead` bo‘lagi, yo‘lda qancha kvadratlar mavjudligini bilmasangiz ham, sizga yo‘lni davom ettirishga imkon beradi.
courseD_farmer_while7_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_b: Ushbu boshqotirmani yechishda takrorlanuvchi siklning ichiga `while path ahead` sikli qo‘yilish yordam berishi mumkin.
courseD_farmer_while7_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_c: Har bir yo‘lning oxirida nima qilishingiz kerak?

courseD_farmer_while8_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_a: Bir nechta `while` siklidan foydalanishingiz kerak bo‘ladi.
courseD_farmer_while8_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_b: Har bir teshik yo‘lning oxirida joylashgan, shuning uchun `while there is a hole` bo‘lagini ishlatishdan oldin `while path ahead` bo‘lagidan foydalaning.
courseD_farmer_while8_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_c: E‘tibor bering, `while path ahead` va `while there is a hole` kod bo‘laklarini olti marta takrorlashingiz kerak.

courseD_farmer_while_challenge1_2021.courseD_farmer_while_challenge1_a: Har bir teshik yoki uyum yo‘lning oxiridan bitta joy **orqada** joylashgan.
courseD_farmer_while_challenge1_2021.courseD_farmer_while_challenge1_b: Agar `while` siklidan foydalansangiz, fermerga uyumni olib tashlashni yoki teshikni to‘ldirishni aytishingiz mumkin, hattoki uyum yoki teshik yo‘q bo‘lsa ham. Demak, fermer qayerda bo‘lishidan qat’i nazar, uni har qanday loy uyumini tozalash yoki teshikni to‘ldirish uchun dasturlashingiz mumkin.
courseD_farmer_while_challenge1_2021.courseD_farmer_conditionals8_c: Bu masalani hech qanday `repeat` siklidan foydalanmasdan yechish mumkin. Buni amalga oshirish uchun siz to‘rtta `while` siklidan foydalanish kerak bo‘ladi.

courseD_harvester_nested_loops_challenge.courseD_harvester_nested_loops_challenge: Barcha makkajo‘xori yetib borish uchun ushbu yo‘ldan harakat qilib ko‘ring!
Birdan ortiq makkajo‘xori yig‘ish uchun `pick corn` buyrug‘idan bir necha marta foydalanishingiz kerak.
Ushbu boshqotirmani javobini topish uchun asosiy siklingiz ichiga kichik sikl joylashtirishingiz kerak bo‘ladi!

courseD_iceage_loops10_2021.courseB_iceage_loops10_a: Singan muzdan ehtiyot bo'ling! Skrat suvga tushib ketmasin!
courseD_iceage_loops10_2021.courseB_iceage_loops10_b: Bosqichlarni baland ovoz bilan aytishga yoki ularni qog'ozga yozishga harakat qiling. Biror  naqsh ko'rayapsizmi?
courseD_iceage_loops10_2021.courseB_iceage_loops10_c: Bu katta jumboq! Ushbu yo'ldan boring.

courseD_iceage_loops1_2021.courseD_iceage_loops1_a: Singan muzdan ehtiyot bo'ling! Skrat suvga tushib ketmasin!
courseD_iceage_loops1_2021.courseD_iceage_loops1_b:
Sizga ushbu bloklardan foydalanishingiz kerak:

<xml><block type="maze_moveForward"/></xml>

courseD_iceage_loops2_2021.courseD_iceage_loops2_a: Jumboqni ikki qismga bo'ling: biri burchakdan oldin va ikkinchisi burchakdan keyin.
courseD_iceage_loops2_2021.courseD_iceage_loops2_b: Agar qotib qolsangiz, qadamlarni baland ovoz bilan aytishga harakat qiling.
courseD_iceage_loops2_2021.courseD_iceage_loops2_c: Skratni yong'oqqa yetkazish uchun ushbu yo'ldan boring.

courseD_iceage_loops3_2021.courseB_iceage_loops3_a:
Bu yangi blokdan foydalaning!

 <xml><block type="controls_repeat_dropdown">
    <title name="TIMES" config="2-10">5</title>
  </block></xml>
courseD_iceage_loops3_2021.courseB_iceage_loops3_b: Kerakli kodni takrorlash uchun "takrorlash" siklini torting, so'ng tegishli blokni ichiga joylang.

courseD_iceage_loops4_2021.courseD_iceage_loops4_a: Natijani ko'rish uchun kodingizni ishlatib ko'rishdan tortinmang!
courseD_iceage_loops4_2021.courseD_iceage_loops4_b: Skratning yong'oqqacha qadamlarini yozib ko'ring. Biror takrorlash ko'rayapsizmi?
courseD_iceage_loops4_2021.courseD_iceage_loops4_c: Bu Skrat bosib o'tishi kerak bo'lgan yo'l.

courseD_iceage_loops6_2021.courseD_iceage_loops6_a: Sizning yakuniy kodingizda **uchta** `move forward` - oldinga harakat bloki bo'lishi kerak.

courseD_iceage_loops7_2021.courseB_iceage_loops7_a: Agar qotib qolsangiz, qadamlarni qog'ozga yozib ko'ring. Biror naqsh ko'rayapsizmi?
courseD_iceage_loops7_2021.courseB_iceage_loops7_b: Bu Skrat yong'oqqa yetishi uchun bosib o'tadigan yo'l.

courseD_iceage_loops8_2021.courseD_iceage_loops8_a: Burilish bloklari to'g'rimi? Yana nimani o'zgartira olasiz?
courseD_iceage_loops8_2021.courseD_iceage_loops8_b: Birinchi sikl **3** marta, ikkinchisi **5** marta, uchinchisi **4** marta va oxirgisi **4** marta bajarilishi kerak.
courseD_iceage_loops8_2021.courseD_iceage_loops8_c: Skratga ushbu yo'lni bosib o'tishda yordam berish uchun sikllardan foydalaning.

courseD_iceage_loops9_2021.courseD_iceage_loops9_a: Muammo bormi? Ushbu jumboqni kichikroq qismlarga ajratib ko'ring. Kod yozish jarayonida jumboqni ishga tushirishdan  qo'rqmang!
courseD_iceage_loops9_2021.courseD_iceage_loops9_b: Sizning yakuniy kodingizda **4** ta sikl bloki bo'lishi kerak.
courseD_iceage_loops9_2021.courseD_iceage_loops9_c: Yong'oqni olish uchun Skrat bu yo'ldan borishi kerak.

courseD_maze_intro4_2021.courseC_maze_programming4_a: Siz Red nuqtai nazaridan o'ngga yoki chapga burilishingiz mumkin. Agar siz o'ng tomonga qaragan bo'lsangiz, o'ngga burilish sizni pastga ishora qiladi.
courseD_maze_intro4_2021.courseC_maze_programming4_b: Yo'l bo'ylab yurish uchun oldinga siljing va bir tomonga buriling, keyin yana siljing va teskari tomonga buriling. Yong'oqqa erishish uchun yana bir marta oldinga siljing.

courseD_maze_intro5a_2021.courseC_maze_programming5_a: Yozgan kodingizni qatorma qator ishlashini ko‘rish uchun "Step" tugmachasini ishlatib ko‘ring. Keyingi bosqichda nima qilishingiz kerakligini bilishingiz mumkinmi?
courseD_maze_intro5a_2021.courseC_maze_programming5_b: Burilishlar Red nuqtai nazaridan ekanligini unutmang
courseD_maze_intro5a_2021.courseC_maze_programming5_c: Xato qilishdan qo‘rqmang! Bo‘laklarni qo‘shishga harakat qiling va nima sodir bo‘lishini ko‘rish uchun kodni ishga tushiring. Xattoki boshqotirma yechilmagan deb bilsangiz ham, uni ishga tushurib, sinab ko‘ring.

courseD_maze_nestedLoops3_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops3_a: Ushbu boshqotirmani yechish uchun, bitta `repeat` siklini boshqa `repeat` tskikl ichiga joylashtirishingiz kerak.
courseD_maze_nestedLoops3_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops3_b: Sikllarni qayerga joylashni bilmayapsizmi? Kodni bitta ketma ketlikda yozib chiqing va o‘xshashliklarni qidirib ko‘ring.
courseD_maze_nestedLoops3_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops3_c: Kodingizni bitta to‘g‘ri yo‘nalish va burilish uchun yozib ko‘ring. Bu yondashuv bilan kungaboqarga yetib bora olasizmi?

courseD_maze_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops4_a:
Labirint bo‘ylab ushbu yo‘lni ishlatib ko‘ring.

![](https://images.code.org/565dbbcaf5862da0f60e54195820e814-image-1505961491245.36.09.png)
courseD_maze_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops4_b: Agarda siklda o‘xshashlikni ko‘rish qiyin bo‘lsa, birinchi unga qaytadan kod yozib ko‘ring va sikllarni joylashtirishdan oldin qaysi kod qayta va qayta takrorlanishini ko‘ring.
courseD_maze_nestedLoops4_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops4_c: Kop qator kod yozishni oldini olish uchun bitta `repeat` siklini boshqa sikl ichida ishlatib ko‘ring.

courseD_maze_nestedLoops5_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops5_a: Ushbu labirintda ichki sikl qayerda ishlatilishi mumkinligini bilish uchun zinapoyaga o‘xshashlikni qidiring.
courseD_maze_nestedLoops5_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops5_b: Sikllarni qayerga joylashni bilmayapsizmi? Kodni bitta ketma ketlikda yozib chiqing va o‘xshashliklarni qidirib ko‘ring.

courseD_maze_nestedLoops6_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops6_a: Yechim topa olamayotgan bo‘lsangiz, kodni qog‘ozga sikllariz yozib ko‘ring va o‘xshashliklarni qidirib ko‘ring.
courseD_maze_nestedLoops6_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops6_b: `repeat` siklini yana o‘zini ichida sikl qilib ishlatish, kod bo‘laklarini kamroq ishlatishga yordam beradi.
courseD_maze_nestedLoops6_2021.courseD_maze_nestedLoops6_c: Ushbu boshqotirmani yechish uchun 2 ta bir birini ichida ishlatilgan `repeat` sikli yetarli bo‘ladi.

courseD_maze_ramp1_2021.courseC_maze_programming1_a: Agarda qush cho'chqaga yetib bora olmayotgan bo‘lsa, barcha 3 ta bloklarni to‘liq biriktirilganligiga ishonch hosil qiling, so‘ngra "Run" tugmachasini qayta bosing.
courseD_maze_ramp1_2021.courseC_maze_programming1_b: Xato qilishdan qo‘rqmang! Bo‘laklarni qo‘shishga harakat qiling va nima sodir bo‘lishini ko‘rish uchun kodni ishga tushiring. Xattoki boshqotirma yechilmagan deb bilsangiz ham, uni ishga tushurib, sinab ko‘ring.

courseD_maze_ramp2_2021.courseC_maze_programming2_a: `move forward` bo‘lagidan foydalanish uchun, uni ish maydonchasidan tashqariga olib chiqing va `when run` bo‘lagi bilan birlashtiring.
courseD_maze_ramp2_2021.courseC_maze_programming2_b: Barcha 3 ta bloklar birga bosilib, "ishga tushirilganda" blokiga biriktirilganligiga ishonch hosil qiling.

courseD_maze_ramp3_2021.courseC_maze_programming3_a:
![](https://images.code.org/afddde0e99d5d270c658de0c03dd6e2c-image-1481174000309.gif)

Biron bir bo‘lakni kodingizni o‘rtasidan olib tashlash uchun qolgan bo‘laklarni o‘chirib tashlamoqchi bo‘lgan bo‘lagingiz tagiga olib o‘ting va ularni ish maydonida oz vaqt ushlab turing. 

Shundan so‘ng, o‘chirib tashlamoqchi bo‘lgan bo‘lagingizga bosing va uni asboblar qutichasiga olib o‘ting.

Va nihoyat, qolgan bo‘laklarni qaytarib o‘zlariga tegishli joyga olib o‘ting.

courseD_maze_ramp5_2021.courseC_maze_programming5_a: Yozgan kodingizni qatorma qator ishlashini ko‘rish uchun "Step" tugmachasini ishlatib ko‘ring. Keyingi bosqichda nima qilishingiz kerakligini bilishingiz mumkinmi?
courseD_maze_ramp5_2021.courseC_maze_programming5_b: Burilishlar qush nuqtai nazaridan ekanligini unutmang.
courseD_maze_ramp5_2021.courseC_maze_programming5_c: Xato qilishdan qo‘rqmang! Bo‘laklarni qo‘shishga harakat qiling va nima sodir bo‘lishini ko‘rish uchun kodni ishga tushiring. Xattoki boshqotirma yechilmagan deb bilsangiz ham, uni ishga tushurib, sinab ko‘ring.

courseD_maze_ramp5b_2021.courseC_maze_programming5_a: Yozgan kodingizni qatorma qator ishlashini ko‘rish uchun "Step" tugmachasini ishlatib ko‘ring. Keyingi bosqichda nima qilishingiz kerakligini bilishingiz mumkinmi?
courseD_maze_ramp5b_2021.courseC_maze_programming5_b: Burilishlar qush nuqtai nazaridan ekanligini unutmang.
courseD_maze_ramp5b_2021.courseC_maze_programming5_c: Xato qilishdan qo‘rqmang! Bo‘laklarni qo‘shishga harakat qiling va nima sodir bo‘lishini ko‘rish uchun kodni ishga tushiring. Xattoki boshqotirma yechilmagan deb bilsangiz ham, uni ishga tushurib, sinab ko‘ring.

courseD_maze_until1_2021.courseD_maze_until1_a: Kodingizni qisqartirish uchun takrorlanishlarni topib, ularni tsikda ishlatishingzi mumkinmi?
courseD_maze_until1_2021.courseD_maze_until1_b: Ushbu boshqotirmani yechish uchun bir-birini ichkiga joylashgan siklardan foydalanib ko‘ring.

courseD_maze_until3_2021.courseD_maze_until3_a:
-   Kodingiz nima qiladi?
-   Kodingiz nima qilishi kerak?
-   Bulardan nimani tushunib olmoqdasiz?
courseD_maze_until3_2021.courseD_maze_until3_b: Agar tushunishingiz qiyin bolayotgan bo‘lsa, bajariladigan qadamlarni qog‘ozga yozib, takroriy amllar mavjud joylarni qidirib ko‘ring.
courseD_maze_until3_2021.courseD_maze_until3_c: Ushbu boshqotirma uchun zinapoya zinasiga o‘xshaydigan takrorlanish bormi?
courseD_maze_until3_2021.courseD_maze_until3_d: Kodingizni qisqartirish uchun `repeat until` bo‘lagidan foydalanishni unutmang.

courseD_maze_until4_2021.courseD_maze_until4_a:
Kodingizni satrma satrm ishga tushirish uchun "Step" tugmachasidan foydalaning.

-   Birinchi bosqichda hammasi kutilgandek ishlamoqdami?
-   Ikkinchi bosqichda hammasi kutilgandek ishlamoqdami?
-   Qayerda xato ketmoqda?
courseD_maze_until4_2021.courseD_maze_until4_b: Ushbu boshqotirma uchun zinapoya zinasiga o‘xshaydigan takrorlanish bormi?
courseD_maze_until4_2021.courseD_maze_until4_c: Kodingizni qisqartirish uchun `repeat until` bo‘lagidan foydalanishni unutmang.

courseD_maze_until5_2021.courseD_maze_until5_b: Faqat bitta `move forward` bo‘lagidan foydalanish uchun uni `repeat until sunflower` bo‘lagiga qadar takrorlang.

courseD_maze_until6_2021.courseD_maze_until6_b: Faqat bitta `move forward` bo‘lagidan foydalanish uchun uni `repeat until sunflower` bo‘lagiga qadar takrorlang.

courseD_maze_until7_2021.courseD_maze_until7_a: Labirint uzun bo‘lganligi uchungina kodingiz o‘tgan safargidan ko‘p bo‘lishi shart emas!
courseD_maze_until7_2021.courseD_maze_until7_b: Garchi hozirgi boshqotirmada oxirgi boshqotirmaga qaraganda ko‘proq burilishlar bo‘lsa ham, `repeat until` kod bo‘lagi tufayli kodingiz deyarli bir xil bo‘lishi mumkin!

courseD_maze_until9_2021.courseD_maze_until8_c: Kungaboqarga yetib borishingiz uchun `repeat until` bo‘lagidan foydalanishni unutmang!

courseE_artist_functions10_2021.courseD_artist_functions10_b: Ushbu rasm oxirgisiga o'xshaydi, ammo "qator chizish" funksiyasi endi boshqa shaklni chizmoqda.
courseE_artist_functions10_2021.courseD_artist_functions10_a: Bir nechta "oldinga siljish" bloklarini ishlatmaslik uchun, "oltiburchak chizish" funksiyasini yarating va uni bir necha marta chaqiring.
courseE_artist_functions10_2021.courseD_artist_functions10_c:
Ushbu rasmda "oltiburchaklar qatori" funksiyasidan qayerda foydalanishi mumkinligini ko'ryapsizmi?

![](https://images.code.org/904e0f38232fd9c15a3d2d172e7dde0b-image-1493140714580.gif)

courseE_artist_functions1_dani.courseE_artist_functions1_a: Kvadratlarning har biri 100 pikselli tomonga ega, ya'ni ikkinchi kvadratni chizishdan oldin 175 piksel oldinga siljish kerak bo'ladi.
courseE_artist_functions1_dani.courseE_artist_functions1_b: Ko'zoynaklarni chizish uchun bir-birining ustidan chiziqlar chizish mumkin.
courseE_artist_functions1_dani.courseE_artist_functions1_c: Qisqaroq kod uchun ko'zoynaklar kvadrat ramkalarini chizish uchun "takrorlash" siklidan foydalanib ko'ring.

courseE_artist_functions2_2021.courseD_artist_functions2_b: Funksiya sizning butun dasturingizni o'z ichiga olmasligi kerak, faqat 100 piksel tomoni bilan kvadrat chizadigan qismini olishi kerak.
courseE_artist_functions2_2021.courseD_artist_functions2_c:
Funksiyangizni chaqirish uchun yashil "kvadrat chizish" funksiyasidan foydalanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling. Aks holda, sizning funksiyangizdagi kod ishlamaydi.

<xml><block type="procedures_callnoreturn" limit="2"><mutation name="draw a square"/></block></xml>
courseE_artist_functions2_2021.courseD_artist_functions2_a:
Sizning dasturingiz quyidagilarni qilish kerak:

-   Funksiyadan foydalanish
-   100 + 75 piksel oldinga siljitish
-   Funksiyadan takroran foydalanish

courseE_artist_functions2_dani.courseD_artist_functions2_b: Siz yozadigan funksiya sizning butun dasturingizni o'z ichiga olmasligi kerak, faqat 100 piksel tomoni bilan kvadrat chizadigan qismini olishi kerak.
courseE_artist_functions2_dani.courseD_artist_functions2_c:
Yashil "kvadrat chizish" funksiyangizni "chaqirish" uchun uni "Ishlayotgan paytda" bloki ostiga joylang. Aks holda, sizning funksiyangizdagi kod ishlamaydi.

<xml><block type="procedures_callnoreturn" limit="2"><mutation name="draw a square"/></block></xml>
courseE_artist_functions2_dani.courseD_artist_functions2_a:
Sizning dasturingiz quyidagilarni qilish kerak:

-   Funksiyadan foydalanish
-   100 + 75 piksel oldinga siljitish
-   Funksiyadan foydalanish

courseE_artist_functions3_dani.courseD_artist_functions3_a:
Ushbu jumboqni hal qilish uchun siz boshlang'ich kodni 8 marta takrorlaydigan siklni qo'shishingiz kerak.

Agar boshlang'ich kod nima ekanligini eslay olmasangiz, ish maydonining yuqori o'ng burchagidagi "boshidan boshlash" tugmasini bosing.
courseE_artist_functions3_dani.courseD_artist_functions3_b: Siklingiz ichida barcha uchta boshlang'ich kod bloklari bo'lishi kerak.

courseE_artist_functions4_dani.courseD_artist_functions4_b: Funksiyangizni yaratishni boshlash uchun asboblar qutisidan "yulduzcha" funksiya blokini torting. U avvalgi jumboq bilan bir xil kodga ega bo'lishi kerak, chunki siz bir xil yulduz naqshini chizasiz.
courseE_artist_functions4_dani.courseD_artist_functions4_c: Ushbu funksiyani asosiy dasturga chaqirish uchun yashil rangdan "yulduzcha chizish" blokidan foydalaning. Har bir yulduz o'rtasida oldinga sakrashni unutmang!

courseE_artist_functions5_2021.courseD_artist_functions5_a: Taslim bo'lmang! Siz o'rgangan narsalarni eslang.
courseE_artist_functions5_2021.courseD_artist_functions5_b: Funksiyalar saqlangan kodni istalgan vaqtda chaqirishni osonlashtiradi, faqat sikl ichidan emas!
courseE_artist_functions5_2021.courseD_artist_functions5_c: "Yulduz chizish" funksiyasini yaratishdan boshlang, so'ngra uchta yulduzni chizish uchun ushbu funksiyadan foydalaning!

courseE_artist_functions5_dani.courseD_artist_functions5_a: Taslim bo'lmang! Siz o'rgangan narsalarni eslang.
courseE_artist_functions5_dani.courseD_artist_functions5_b: Funksiyalar saqlangan kodni istalgan vaqtda chaqirishni osonlashtiradi, faqat sikl ichidan emas!
courseE_artist_functions5_dani.courseD_artist_functions5_c: Yulduz shakli kodini "yulduz chizish" funksiyasiga ichiga joylang, so'ng uchta yulduzni chizish uchun ushbu funksiyadan foydalaning!

courseE_artist_functions7_2021.courseD_artist_functions7_a: Avval o'z funksiyangizni yaratishga harakat qiling, so'ng birma-bir derazalar qo'shing.
courseE_artist_functions7_2021.courseD_artist_functions7_b: Yuqori oynalardan pastki derazalarga o'tish uchun shunchaki rassomni o'ng tomonga burib, 150 pikselga sakrating, so'ngra rassomni yana o'ng tomonga buring! Endi rassom uyning qolgan qismini tugatish uchun to'g'ri yo'nalishgda bo'ladi!

courseE_artist_functions8_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_f: Sizga faqat bitta "oldinga siljish" bloki kerak, ammo sizga bir nechta "oldinga sakrash" va/yoki "orqaga o'tish" bloklari kerak bo'ladi!
courseE_artist_functions8_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_a:
Kvadrat uchun funksiyani bajarishdan boshlang, so'ngra kvadratlar qatori uchun funksiyani bajarishga harakat qiling.

Ushbu tasvirni yaratish uchun "kvadratlar qatoriini chizish" funksiyasidan qanday foydalangan bo'lar edingiz?
courseE_artist_functions8_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_d:
Kvadratlar qatorini yaratish uchun,

-   3 marta takrorlang
    -   yon tomoni **50 piksel** bo'lgan kvadrat chizing
    -   oldinga **100 piksel**ga sakrang
courseE_artist_functions8_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_b:
Ushbu rasmdagi har bir qatorni 3 kvadratdan iborat qator sifatida tasavvur qiling. Nechta kvadrat qatorlari bor va ularning har birini qayerdan chizishni boshlaysiz?

![](<https://images.code.org/22a6f5cc5551371057244eee01955f8e-image-1493135135468.4.10 Hint Drawing.png>)
courseE_artist_functions8_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_c: Siljigan kvadratlarning har bir to'plamining oxirida rassom keyingi siljigan kvadratlar to'plamini chizishdan oldin pastga va orqaga sakrashi kerak bo'ladi.

courseE_artist_functions8b_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_f: Agar buni to'g'ri bajarayotgan bo'lsangiz, sizga faqat bitta "oldinga siljish" bloki kerak!
courseE_artist_functions8b_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_a: Kvadrat chizish uchun funksiyani yaratishdan boshlang, so'ngra kvadratlar qatorini chizish uchun funksiya yaratishga harakat qiling.
courseE_artist_functions8b_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_d:
Kvadratlar qatorini chizish uchun:

-   3 marta takrorlang
    -   kvadrat chizing
    -   100 piksel oldinga sakrang\*\*

courseE_artist_functions8c_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_f: Bu ko'ringanidan osonroq! Bunda sizga "siljish" yoki "sakrash" bloklari kerak emas!
courseE_artist_functions8c_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_a: Kvadratlarning ikkinchi qatori birinchisidan faqat 180 daraja burchakka farq qiladi!
courseE_artist_functions8c_2021.courseD_artist_functions8_c: Kvadratlarning har bir qatorining oxirida, keyingi kvadratlarni chizishdan oldin rassom faqat 180 darajaga burilish kerak. Keyingi mashqni bajarish uchun barchasini takrorlash sikliga qo'ying!

courseE_artist_functions9_2021.courseD_artist_functions9_e:
Ushbu rasmda "uchburchaklar qatori" ishlatilishi mumkin bo'lgan to'rtala joyni ham ko'ra olasizmi?

![](https://images.code.org/130e1040ecca7186dea87f42666f5620-image-1493140373966.gif)
courseE_artist_functions9_2021.courseD_artist_functions9_a:
Ushbu jumboqni uch qismga bo'lish mumkin:

-   "uchburchak chizish" funksiyasini bajaring
-   "uchburchaklar qatorini chizish" funksiyasini bajaring
-   rasmni bajarish uchun "uchburchaklar qatorini chizish" funksiyasini to'rt marta ishlating
courseE_artist_functions9_2021.courseD_artist_functions9_b: Ushbu rasm uchburchaklar qatorini 4 marta chizish va keyingi uchburchak qatorini chizishdan oldin 60 yoki 120 darajaga burilish orqali amalga oshiriladi.
courseE_artist_functions9_2021.courseD_artist_functions9_c:
Uchburchaklar qatorini chizish uchun:

-   4 marta takrorlang
    -   uchburchak chizing
    -   50 piksel oldinga sakrang
courseE_artist_functions9_2021.courseD_artist_functions9_d:
Olmosni chizish uchun:

-   2 marta takrorlang
    -   uchburchaklar qatorini chizing
    -   60 daraja buriling
    -   uchburchaklar qatorini chizing
    -   120 daraja buriling

courseE_artist_functions_challenge1_2021.courseE_artist_functions_challenge1_a: Agar funksiyani yana bir bor chaqirsangiz, oxirgi burchakda bir xil dizaynni yaratishingiz mumkin.
courseE_artist_functions_challenge1_2021.courseE_artist_functions_challenge1_b: Shuningdek, siz boshqa pozitsiyalarga o'tish yoki butun dizaynni xohlagancha o'zgartirishingiz mumkin!

courseE_artist_functions_challenge2_2021.courseE_artist_functions_challenge1_a:
<xml>
  <block type="jump_to_xy">
    <title name="XPOS">350</title>
    <title name="YPOS">200</title>
  </block>
  </xml>

Ushbu "sakrab o'tish" bloki zombi rassomini istalgan vaqtda katakchaning istalgan pikseliga ko'chirishga imkon beradi. Uni bir nechta piksel o'ngga va bir nechta piksel pastga siljitish orqali ishlaydi. Bu har doim yuqori chap burchakdan hisoblanadi, demak, zombi rassomi buyruqni qayerda bajarishi muhim emas!

![](https://images.code.org/b90fdddc778a27e199221271ce91307a-image-1496450976440.png)

courseE_farmer_functions1_2021.courseE_farmer_functions1_a: Asboblar qutisi bu safar biroz boshqacha tartibda! Qaysi bloklaringiz borligini ko'rish uchun turli toifalarni bosib ko'ring.
courseE_farmer_functions1_2021.courseE_farmer_functions1_b: Siz faqat bitta oshqovoqni yig'ishingiz kerak, ammo unga erishish uchun sikldan foydalana olasizmi?

courseE_farmer_functions1a_2021.courseE_farmer_functions1a_a: Funksiya ta'rifini o'qiganingizga ishonch hosil qiling. U nima qilishini ayta olasizmi?
courseE_farmer_functions1a_2021.courseE_farmer_functions1a_b: Qovoqqa yetib borish uchun "takrorlash" blokidan foydalaning!

courseE_farmer_functions2b_2021.courseE_farmer_functions2b_a: Ikkala yo'lning oxiriga yetib borish uchun siz "qovoqqa qadar takrorlash" dan foydalanishingiz mumkin.
courseE_farmer_functions2b_2021.courseE_farmer_functions2b_b: Bog'lanish yo'lida makkajo'xori yo'q shuning uchun siz shunchaki u bo'ylab harakatlanib burilishingiz mumkin.
courseE_farmer_functions2b_2021.courseE_farmer_functions2b_c: Barcha hosilni olish uchun sizga ikkita alohida "takrorlash" bloklari kerak bo'ladi.

courseE_farmer_functions2ba_2021.courseE_farmer_functions2ba_a: Qovoqlarni barchasini olishga ishonch hosil qilish uchun yashil rangdagi "barcha qovoqlarni olish" blokidan foydalaning!

courseE_farmer_functions3c1_2021.coursee_farmer_functions3c1_2018_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun "yo'l bo'ylab yig'ish" funksiyasidan uch marta foydalanishingiz kerak bo'ladi.
courseE_farmer_functions3c1_2021.coursee_farmer_functions3c1_2018_b: Burchaklarni aylanib o'tish uchun qanday kod kiritish kerak?

courseE_farmer_functions7a1_2021.courseE_farmer_functions7a1_2018_a: O'z funksiyangizni asboblar qutisidagi "funksiyalar" bo'limi ostida yarating.
courseE_farmer_functions7a1_2021.courseE_farmer_functions7a1_2018_b: Funksiyangizni yasab bo'lgach, undan foydalanishni unutmang!

courseE_farmer_functions8a1_2021.courseE_farmer_functions8a1_2018a: Ushbu jumboq yechimini oxirgi jumboqdagi funksiyangiz kodi bilan boshlang.
courseE_farmer_functions8a1_2021.courseE_farmer_functions8a1_2018b: Funksiya birinchi marta ishlagandan so'ng, uni qayta ishga tushirishdan oldin qo'shimcha burilish qilishingiz kerak bo'ladi.

courseE_farmer_functions9a1_2021.courseE_farmer_functions9a1_2018b: Ushbu jumboqning birinchi yarmini yechish uchun xuddi avvalgi jumboqdagi qadamlardan foydalaning.
courseE_farmer_functions9a1_2021.courseE_farmer_functions9a1_2018c: Funksiyangizni takroran chaqirishdan oldin salatning so'nggi hosilini olish uchun sizga bir necha marta "burilish" va "oldinga siljish" kerak bo'ladi.

courseE_farmer_ramp11a_2021.courseE_farmer_ramp12_a: Fermerga necha marta belkurak bilan loy olib tashlashni `repeat` sikli bilan aytish o'rniga endi siz `while there is a pile` blokidan foydalanishingiz mumkin.
courseE_farmer_ramp11a_2021.courseE_farmer_ramp12_b: Loy uyumiga yetish uchun faqat bir marta oldinga siljish kerak.

courseE_farmer_ramp11b_2021.courseE_farmer_ramp11b_a: Kodingizni qisqartirish uchun "while" siklini "takrorlash" sikli ichiga joylashtirishingiz mumkin.

courseE_farmer_ramp12_forswap_2021.courseE_farmer_ramp12_b: Fermerga necha marta oldinga yurish va salat olish kerakligini aytib berish uchun hali ham tashqi "takrorlash" siklidan foydalanish kerak.

courseE_farmer_ramp12c_2021.courseE_farmer_ramp12b_b: Siz hali ham avval "until`" siklidan foydalanishingiz kerak, keyin salatga yetib borganingizdan so'ng "while`" siklidan foydalaning.

courseE_farmer_ramp12d_2021.courseE_farmer_ramp12d_b: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun siz hali ham "until" va "while" sikllarini "takrorlash" sikli ichiga joylashingiz kerak!

courseE_farmer_ramp12e_2021.courseE_farmer_ramp12e_b: Ushbu jumboq yechimi so'nggi jumboq yechimiga o'xshaydi, ammo boshqa tomonga burilish talab etiladi.

courseE_farmer_ramp12f_2021.courseE_farmer_ramp12f_b: Fermerga o'ngga yoki chapga burilish kerakligini hal qilishda yordam berish uchun "if/else" blokidan foydalaning.

courseE_farmer_while1_2021.courseE_farmer_ramp12G_b: Fermerga o'ngga yoki chapga burilish kerakligini hal qilishda yordam berish uchun "if/else" blokidan foydalaning.

courseF_artist_for6_2021.courseF_artist_for6_a: Sizning `for` siklingiz 15 dan 300 gacha 15 gacha bo‘ladi.
courseF_artist_for6_2021.courseF_artist_for6_b: Ushbu for for sikli ichida `move forward` va `turn` bo‘laklarini qo‘ying.
courseF_artist_for6_2021.courseF_artist_for6_c: Faqatgina "navbat" bo‘lakidagi darajalar soni o‘zgarishi kerak.

courseF_artist_for7_2021.courseF_artist_for7_a: Ushbu boshqotirmada qalam ingichka. Boshlashdan oldin uni "1" ga o‘rnatishingiz kerak bo‘ladi.
courseF_artist_for7_2021.courseF_artist_for7_b: E‘tibor bering, bu spiral chap o‘rniga o‘ngga buriladi!
courseF_artist_for7_2021.courseF_artist_for7_c: Ushbu boshqotirmadagi `for` sikli 15 dan 300 gacha 2 gacha.
courseF_artist_for7_2021.courseF_artist_for7_d: Ushbu rasm atigi 89 daraja burilish orqali qilingan.

courseF_artist_for8_2021.courseF_artist_for8_a: O‘zingizning kodingizda hamma narsani bir xil saqlang, faqat burilish burchagi o‘zgarishi kerak.
courseF_artist_for8_2021.courseF_artist_for8_b: Agar xohlasangiz, spiralingiz uchun boshqa rangni tanlashingiz mumkin!

courseF_artist_for9_2021.courseF_artist_for9_a: Agar siz "set alfa`" bo‘lagini`for`sikli ichiga joylashtirsangiz va uni o‘zgartirish uchun` counter\` o‘zgaruvchisidan foydalansangiz, siz shunday dizayn yaratishingiz mumkin.
courseF_artist_for9_2021.courseF_artist_for9_b: "O‘rnatilgan alfa" bo‘laki rangning xiraligini o‘zgartiradi. Qiymat qanchalik kichik bo‘lsa, rang shaffofroq bo‘ladi.

courseF_artist_for_challenge1_2021.courseF_artist_for_challenge1_a: `pen width` 1 ga teng. Birinchi kvadrat 50 pikselli tomonga ega va har bir kvadrat oxirgisidan 50 piksel kengroq.
courseF_artist_for_challenge1_2021.courseF_artist_for_challenge1_b: Cho‘tkaning xiraligi har doim `counter` / 2 amalining qiymatiga teng bo‘ladi.
courseF_artist_for_challenge1_2021.courseF_artist_for_challenge1_c: Har bir kvadratni yaratganingizdan so‘ng, orqaga sakrashni, burilishni, yana sakrashni, keyin orqaga burilishni unutmang!
