courseF_artist_for_challenge2_2021.courseF_artist_for_challenge2_c: `for` sikli 5 dan 250 gacha 2 soni qo‘shilgan holda oshib boradi.
courseF_artist_for_challenge2_2021.courseF_artist_for_challenge2_a: Rangning o‘zgarishi `set color with red, green, blue` bo‘lagi yordamida amalga oshiriladi. Qizil rang doimiy ravishda 255 darajasida o‘rnatiladi, yashil rang har doim `counter`ning qiymati, ko‘k esa doimo `255 - counter`ning qiymatiga teng bo‘ladi.
courseF_artist_for_challenge2_2021.courseF_artist_for_challenge2_b: Buning kodi siz o‘ylaganingizdan sodda. Faqat for for ichidagi rangni o‘rnating, oldinga harakatlantiring va keyin buriling.

courseF_artist_variables10_2021.courseF_artist_variables10_a: Ushbu darajadan zavqlaning! Sizning kodingizda qanday ozgina o‘zgarishlar bo‘lishi mumkinligini ko‘rib chiqing.
courseF_artist_variables10_2021.courseF_artist_variables10_b: Siz bir nechta narsani sinab ko‘rishingiz va kodingizni bir necha marta ishlatishingiz mumkin.

courseF_artist_variables7_2021.courseF_artist_variables7_a: Kodni "belgilangan uzunlik" bo‘lagidan foydalanib boshlang. Uzunlik o‘zgaruvchisini 150 ga sozlang.
courseF_artist_variables7_2021.courseF_artist_variables7_b: Uchburchak uchun kodingizni soddalashtirish uchun `repeat` siklidan foydalanishingiz mumkin.
courseF_artist_variables7_2021.courseF_artist_variables7_c: Uchburchakning burchaklarini yasash uchun chapga 120 daraja burilishni xohlaysiz.

courseF_artist_variables8_2021.courseF_artist_variables8_b: Uchburchak uchun kodni "belgilangan uzunlik" bo‘laki bilan boshlashni unutmang va uni 150 pikseldan boshlang.
courseF_artist_variables8_2021.courseF_artist_variables8_c: Uchburchakni chizish uchun `repeat` siklidan foydalanganingizga ishonch hosil qiling.

courseF_artist_variables9_2021.courseF_artist_variables9_a: Ushbu boshqotirma uchun sizga loopning necha marta takrorlanishini o‘zgartirish kifoya.

courseF_bee_for10_2021.courseF_bee_for10_a: Bosish kerak bo‘lgan qadamlar va yig‘iladigan nektarlar soni o‘rtasida naqsh topa olasizmi?
courseF_bee_for10_2021.courseF_bee_for10_b: Birinchi gullar to‘plamida jami \*\* 14 gul \*\* mavjud. Ushbu birinchi to‘plamga erishish uchun asalarilar \*\* 7 kvadratchalar (yoki 14 kvadratlar 2 ga bo‘linib) shov-shuv qilishlari kerak. Keyingi to‘plamda qancha gul bor va u erga borish uchun qancha kvadrat sayohat qilish kerak bo‘ladi?
courseF_bee_for10_2021.courseF_bee_for10_c: boshqotirmada gullarning birinchi to‘plamida \*\* 14 \*\* gul, ikkinchi to‘plamda \*\* 10 \*\* gul, uchinchi to‘plamda \*\* 6 \*\* gul, to‘rtinchi to‘plamda \*\* 2 \*\* gullari bor. Ushbu rasmda \*\* 7 \*\* qizil kvadrat, \*\* 5 \*\* to‘q sariq kvadrat, \*\* 3 \*\* yashil kvadrat va \*\* 1 \*\* ko‘k bo‘lak borligiga e‘tibor bering. \[] [0] Raqamlar qanday bog‘liq?
courseF_bee_for10_2021.courseF_bee_for10_d: Sizda 2 ta takrorlash kerak bo‘ladi, ulardan biri matematik bo‘lakdan foydalanadi.

courseF_bee_for11_2021.courseF_bee_for11_a: 12 dan 15 gacha qancha kichik? \\ 9 dan 12 gacha qancha kam? Naqshni ko‘rayapsizmi?

courseF_bee_for1_2021.courseF_bee_for1_b: Barcha nektarlarni yig‘ish uchun sizga `repeat` siklingizda ikkita bo‘lak kerak bo‘ladi.

courseF_bee_for2_2021.courseF_bee_for2_a: Agar siz chalkashib ketgan bo‘lsangiz, birma-bir gul bilan ishlang va tez-tez sinab ko‘ring.
courseF_bee_for2_2021.courseF_bee_for2_b: Har bir siklidan o‘rtasida oldinga siljishni unutmang, shunda siz har bir gulga yetasiz.

courseF_bee_for4_2021.courseF_bee_for4_a: Ushbu boshqotirmani yechish uchun 1 dan 7 gacha bo‘lgan `for` siklidan foydalaning.
courseF_bee_for4_2021.courseF_bee_for4_b: `for` sikli ichida siz `move forward` buyrug‘iga va nektar to‘plash uchun siklga ega bo‘lishni xohlaysiz.
courseF_bee_for4_2021.courseF_bee_for4_c: Etarli nektar olish uchun ichki `repeat` sikli ichida "counter" o‘zgaruvchisini ishlatganingizga ishonch hosil qiling!

courseF_bee_for5_2021.courseF_bee_for5_a: Bu safar sizning `move forward` bo‘lakingiz va "get nektar" bo‘lakingiz alohida `repeat` sikllarida bo‘lishi kerak, ikkalasi ham `for` siklidan ichida.
courseF_bee_for5_2021.courseF_bee_for5_b: Har bir siklidan `counter` o‘zgaruvchisidan foydalaning, shunda asalarilar har bir gul orasida har xil masofani siljitadi.
courseF_bee_for5_2021.courseF_bee_for5_c: Xato qilishdan qo‘rqmang! Hali ham boshqotirmani hal qilmagan bo‘lsangiz ham, nima bo‘lishini ko‘rish uchun bo‘laklarni qo‘shib kodni ishlatib ko‘ring.

courseF_bee_for6_2021.courseF_bee_for6_a: O‘zingizning takroriy siklingiz ichida "qarshi" o‘zgaruvchini ishlatishni unutmang.
courseF_bee_for6_2021.courseF_bee_for6_b: `for` sikli ichida siz `move forward` buyrug‘iga va nektar to‘plash uchun siklga ega bo‘lishni xohlaysiz.
courseF_bee_for6_2021.courseF_bee_for6_c: Sizning siklingiz \*\* 5 dan 1 \*\* gacha bo‘lishi kerak.

courseF_bee_for7_2021.courseF_bee_for7_a: Sizning `for` siklingiz 1 dan 7 gacha 2 gacha hisoblashingiz kerak bo‘ladi.
courseF_bee_for7_2021.courseF_bee_for7_b: `for` sikli ichida siz `move forward` buyrug‘iga va nektar to‘plash uchun siklga ega bo‘lishni xohlaysiz.
courseF_bee_for7_2021.courseF_bee_for7_c: O‘zingizning takroriy siklingizda `counter` o‘zgaruvchisini ishlatishni unutmang.

courseF_bee_for8_2021.courseF_bee_for8_a: Agar sizning siklingiz hisoblansa, o‘sish sizning hisoblagich o‘zgaruvchingizga har safar qo‘shiladi. Nektarning navbatdagi miqdorini olish uchun har bir raqamga nimani qo‘shishingiz kerak?
courseF_bee_for8_2021.courseF_bee_for8_b: Ushbu boshqotirmada siz gullarga etib borish uchun zinapoyadan qadamma-qadam yurishingiz kerak bo‘ladi.
courseF_bee_for8_2021.courseF_bee_for8_c: Sizning siklingiz _funksiyani 3 dan 15_ gacha bir oz o‘sish bilan hisoblaydi. Nima u?

courseF_bee_for9_2021.courseF_bee_for9_a: Hisoblagich o‘zgaruvchisi bilan bir nechta matematikani bajarishga harakat qiling. Siz to‘plashingiz kerak bo‘lgan nektar miqdoriga tenglashish uchun har bir gulda peshtaxtada nima qilishingiz kerak?
courseF_bee_for9_2021.courseF_bee_for9_c: boshqotirmani hal qilishni istasangiz, har bir siklidan iteratsiya boshida asani burishingiz kerak bo‘ladi.
courseF_bee_for9_2021.courseF_bee_for9_b: \*\* Esingizda bo‘lsin: \*\* Agar siklingiz hisoblansa, o‘sish har safar sizning "counter" o‘zgaruvchingizga qo‘shiladi.

courseF_bee_for_challenge2_2021.courseF_bee_for_challenge2_a: Harakatlanish uchun ushbu variantni ko‘rib chiqing: \[] [0]
courseF_bee_for_challenge2_2021.courseF_bee_for_challenge2_b: Ikki `for` siklidan foydalanib ko‘ring: biri nektarga ko‘tarilish va ushlab olish uchun, ikkinchisi pastga ko‘tarilib asal tayyorlash uchun.
courseF_bee_for_challenge2_2021.courseF_bee_for_challenge2_c: E‘tibor bering, bitta `for` siklidan narvon naqshini oshirish uchun "qarshi" marta takrorlanadigan bir nechta muntazam siklidan kerak bo‘ladi. Boshqa `for` sikli uchun "qarshi" miqdorda asal tayyorlash uchun faqat bitta oddiy sikl kerak.
courseF_bee_for_challenge2_2021.courseF_bee_for_challenge2_d:
**Yechim:**

<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false" movable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="controls_for" inline="true">
        <title name="VAR">counter</title>
        <value name="FROM">
          <block type="math_number">
            <title name="NUM">1</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <value name="TO">
          <block type="math_number">
            <title name="NUM">3</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <value name="BY">
          <block type="math_number">
            <title name="NUM">1</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <statement name="DO">
          <block type="controls_repeat_ext" inline="true">
            <value name="TIMES">
              <block type="variables_get">
                <title name="VAR">counter</title>
              </block>
            </value>
            <statement name="DO">
              <block type="maze_moveForward"/>
            </statement>
            <next>
              <block type="controls_repeat_ext" inline="true">
                <value name="TIMES">
                  <block type="variables_get">
                    <title name="VAR">counter</title>
                  </block>
                </value>
                <statement name="DO">
                  <block type="maze_nectar"/>
                </statement>
                <next>
                  <block type="maze_turn">
                    <title name="DIR">turnLeft</title>
                    <next>
                      <block type="controls_repeat_ext" inline="true">
                        <value name="TIMES">
                          <block type="variables_get">
                            <title name="VAR">counter</title>
                          </block>
                        </value>
                        <statement name="DO">
                          <block type="maze_moveForward"/>
                        </statement>
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_turn">
                            <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </next>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </statement>
        <next>
          <block type="maze_turn">
            <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
            <next>
              <block type="maze_turn">
                <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
                <next>
                  <block type="controls_for" inline="true">
                    <title name="VAR">counter</title>
                    <value name="FROM">
                      <block type="math_number">
                        <title name="NUM">2</title>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="TO">
                      <block type="math_number">
                        <title name="NUM">10</title>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <value name="BY">
                      <block type="math_number">
                        <title name="NUM">2</title>
                      </block>
                    </value>
                    <statement name="DO">
                      <block type="maze_moveForward">
                        <next>
                          <block type="maze_turn">
                            <title name="DIR">turnLeft</title>
                            <next>
                              <block type="maze_moveForward">
                                <next>
                                  <block type="maze_turn">
                                    <title name="DIR">turnRight</title>
                                    <next>
                                      <block type="controls_repeat_ext" inline="true">
                                        <value name="TIMES">
                                          <block type="variables_get">
                                            <title name="VAR">counter</title>
                                          </block>
                                        </value>
                                        <statement name="DO">
                                          <block type="maze_honey"/>
                                        </statement>
                                      </block>
                                    </next>
                                  </block>
                                </next>
                              </block>
                            </next>
                          </block>
                        </next>
                      </block>
                    </statement>
                  </block>
                </next>
              </block>
            </next>
          </block>
        </next>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

courseF_text_concat.prompt_example:
<xml>
  <block type="when_run" deletable="false">
    <next>
      <block type="gamelab_setPrompt">
        <value name="QUESTION">
          <block type="text">
            <title name="TEXT">What is your name?</title>
          </block>
        </value>
        <value name="VAR">
          <block type="variables_get" can_disconnect_from_parent="false">
            <title name="VAR">name</title>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
  <block type="gamelab_whenPromptAnswered">
    <value name="VAR">
      <block type="variables_get" can_disconnect_from_parent="false">
        <title name="VAR">name</title>
      </block>
    </value>
    <next>
      <block type="gamelab_printText">
        <value name="TEXT">
          <block type="gamelab_textJoin">
            <title name="TEXT1">Hello, </title>
            <value name="TEXT2">
              <block type="gamelab_textVariableJoin">
                <title name="VAR">name</title>
                <value name="TEXT2">
                  <block type="gamelab_textJoin">
                    <title name="TEXT1">!</title>
                  </block>
                </value>
              </block>
            </value>
          </block>
        </value>
      </block>
    </next>
  </block>
</xml>

coursea_maze_ramp1_2021.courseC_maze_programming1_a: Agarda qush cho'chqaga yetib bora olmayotgan bo‘lsa, 2 ta bloklarni to‘liq biriktirilganligiga ishonch hosil qiling, so‘ngra "Run" tugamachasini qayta bosing.
coursea_maze_ramp1_2021.courseC_maze_programming1_b: Xato qilishdan qo'rqmang! Biror narsani sinab ko'ring, agar u ishlamasa, boshqasini sinab ko'ring!

iceage_move_events_dani.iceage_move_events_a: Jumboqni yechish uchun "\_\_\_ o'q bosilganda" hodisalarining har biri unga bog'liq bo'lgan `move actor 1` buyrug'iga ega bo'lishi kerak.

iceage_sound_and_points_dani.iceage_sound_and_points_a: Siz `when actor 1 touches actor 2` - "aktyor 1 aktyor 2 bilan teginsa" hodisa ostiga ikkita blok qo'shishingiz kerak bo'ladi.
iceage_sound_and_points_dani.iceage_sound_and_points_b: Ushbu darajadan o'tish uchun sizga `score a point` bloki va 'play \_\_\_\_ sound\` bloki kerak bo'ladi.

iceage_warn_ice_age_dani.iceage_warn_ice_age_a: Ushbu jumboqni yechish uchun kerakli joyda faqat ikkita blok qo'shishingiz kerak.
iceage_warn_ice_age_dani.iceage_warn_ice_age_b: Dastur boshlangandan so'ng darhol ishlashi uchun ikkala yangi blokni `when run` - "ishga tushirilganda" hodisasiga biriktiring.

courseC_PlayLab_eventsA_embed_2021.courseC_PlayLab_eventsA_a: Pingvinni harakatlantirish uchun strelka tugmalaridan foydalaning. Bu darajani tugatish uchun hech qanday kod yozishning hojati yo'q.
